text_show:
Inyuma y’ingingo y’inama ijejwe umutekano kw’isi ONU yo kurungika abapolisi mu Burundi,bamwe mubakuru b’imigabwe hamwe n’abavugizi b’imigabwe batanguye kunegura iyo ngingo yafashwe n’inama ijejwe umutekano kw’isi .
Uwambere yagaye iyo ngingo y’inama ijejwe umutekano kw’isi n’umuvugizi w’urunani CNARED giriteka (Le Conseil National pour le respect de l’Accord d’Arusha pour la Paix et la Réconciliation au Burundi et la Restauration d’un Etat de Droit).
Pancrace Cimpaye yamenyesheje ko ingingo yafashwe n’inama ijejwe umutekano kw’isi yo kurungika abapolisi mu Burundi ari agasuzuguro kadasanzwe ku Burundi hamwe n’abarundi bose hamwe kuko ataco bazoba baje gukora atari ukwitemberera.
Umviriza amajwi ya Pancrace Cimpaye musi
Kurundi ruhande Francois Nyamoya asanzwe ari umunyamabanga mukuru w’umugabwe wa MSD nawe asanga ingingo y’inama ijejwe umutekano kw’isi ,ONU,atanakimwe izomarira abarundi na gato kuko abo bapolisi atanakimwe bibitezeko.
Francois Nyamoya wewe abandanya amenyesha ko yatangajwe niyo ngongo ndetse ko bimwereka ko ivyabaye mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994 ataco vyigishije nagato ishirahamwe ONU
Umviriza hasi mu majwi Francois Nyamoya umunyamabanga mukuru w’umugabwe MSD
Yanditswe na:Bujatoday

Abo bagabo ni Simon Paul wo muri Montana na Travis John Branson w’i Washington. Inyandiko y’ibirego igaragaza ko bakurikiranyweho urutonde rw’ibyaha 15, bijyanye no kurenga ku itegeko rirengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima by’umwihariko ibisiga, icyaha cyo gucura umugambi mubi wangiza ibinyabuzima, kurenga ku itegeko rirengera za Kagoma n’ibindi bisiga ndetse no gucuruza mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko ibice by’inyamaswa.
Ubushinjacyaha ntabwo bwasobanuye ubundi bwoko bw’inyoni aba bagabo bishe, bakavuga ko ari ubwoko bw’inyoni butandukanye.
Inyandiko y’ibirego yashyizwe ahagaragara ivuga ko bishe inyoni hagati ya Mutarama 2015 kugeza Werurwe 2021, Paul na Branson barashe mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bica inyoni mu gace ka Flathead Indian Reservation mu burengerazuba bwa Montana, n’ahandi hantu hatandukanye, nk’uko ubushinjacyaha bwa Amerika bwabitangaje.
Inyandiko y’ibirego ivuga ko uwitwa John Branson, umwe mu bakurikiranyweho kwica izi nyoni yivuyemo ubwo yashyiraga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze, ubutumwa yigamba gukora ibi byaha byo kwica izi nyoni ndetse anavuga ko yabikuyemo amafaranga menshi cyane.
Biteganijwe ko aba bagabo bombi bazashyikirizwa urukiko tariki ya 8 Mutarama 2024, nk’uko ubushinjacyaha bwa Amerika bubitangaza.

Kuri uyu munsi tariki 21 Ukuboza 2020 Perezida wa Repubulika w’u Rwanda Paul Kagame yagejeje ku banyarwanda ijambo uko umutekano ndetse n’ubuzima igihugu kirimo.
Perezida Kagame yagiye avuga ku ngingo zitandukanye harimo Ubuzima ,Uburezi ndetse avuga ku mutekano aho yavuze ko ikibazo ubu kiri ku gihugu cy’abaturanyi cy’u Burundi ariko avuga ko hari ibiganiro hagati y’Ibihugu byombi kandi ko bizatanga umusaruro.
Ku gihugu cya Congo Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ibibazo
... 
a ibibazo byinshi biracyemuka.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ku mutekano mu majyaruguru y’Igihugu hari igihugu cya Uganda ariko ntiyigeze avuga izina Uganda kandi abantu benshi bari biteze ko avuga ku kibazo cya Uganda n’uRwanda kuko corona virus yaje n’ubundi imipaka ifunze kubera ibibazo bya politike hagati y’ibihugu byombi ariko yavuze ko habaye ibiganiro ndetse bigeze kure kandi ko bizakemuka ati “Nabo bazamenya ko iyo dufite umutekano nabo bakwiye kuwugira”.

 muri rusange Perezida yavuze ko igihugu gihagaze neza.
Ku kibazo cya Rusesabagina Paul Perezida Paul Kagame yasubije uwari wakibajije avuga ko amahanga akomeje gusaba ko ubwe Perezida afungura rusesabagina maze avuga ko abo bose ibyo bavuga hari ubutabera kandi umuntu wese ufite ibyo ashinjwa Ubutabera nicyo buberaho bategereze icyo ubutabera buzahitamo bukurikije ibyaha ashinjwa birimo ibitero byahitanye abantu kuko n’imiryango y’ababuze abantu babo bakeneye ubutabera.

Imitwe y’inyeshyamba irimo FDLR, Nyatura, bongeye gutemagura Inka z’abaturage bavuga ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda muri Notabilite ya Nyakigano, muri Localite ya Kinyefu, Gurupoma ya Ufamando I, muri Teritwari ya Masisi, collectivite ya Bahunde mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyarugu, muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo.
Inka zatemaguwe zirenga 10, zose ni iza abaturage bavuga ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda nk’uko amakuru abivuga.izi nka zatemaguwe ubwo zari ku musozi wa Nyakigano maze ziza guhura nabo bagizi ba na
... 
basanzwe bakorana byahafi n’Ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo (FARDC).
Bazitemaguye bakoresheje imipanga( imihoro). Zimwe muri izo nka bazikomerekeje kuko inyinshi bazitemye ibitsi izindi bazikata imirizo, izindi nazo bazikata amacebe yazo.
Umubare w’inka zapfuye ushobora kwiyongera kuko abashumba bazo, bavuze ko izapfuye ari nyinshi, kuko izapfaga bahitaga bajyana inyama zazo bakajya kuzirya.
Uyu mutwe wa FDLR na Nyatura, basanzwe bakorana byahafi n’ingabo za FARDC, ibi byo gutema Ink
...
abavuga ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda no kuziba n’ibikorwa bamazemo igihe kirekire. Izi nyeshyamba zikomeza kugirira nabi abavuga ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda mu rwego rwo gushaka kubirukana k’ubutaka bwa Congo.
Mu mpera z’ uyu mwaka wa 2023 muri ibi bice byo muri Teritwari ya Masisi, bariya barwanyi ba FDLR na Nyatura bishe Inka z’abatutsi zibarigwa muri magana ane(400). Kugeza ubu ntacyo leta ya Kinshasa irabitangazaho.
Tubibutseko mu nka zatemaguwe harimo n’izuwitwa Benimana w’umugesera.
Uwineza Adeline

Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha rwataye muri yombi ukekwaho kwica nyakwigendera Nduwamungu Pauline wari wararokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, uniyemerera ko ari we wabikoze, runatangaza bimwe mu byo yavugiye mu ibazwa rye.
Ni nyuma yuko hari abatawe muri yombi bakekwaho uruhare mu rupfu rwa Nduwamungu Pauline wari utuye i Rukumberi mu Karere ka Ngoma, wishwe ku wa Kane w’icyumweru gishize tariki 14 Ugushyingo, urupfu rwe rukamenyekana bucyeye bwaho tariki 15, aho igihimba cye cyabonetse mu 
... 
ugo rwe.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, rutangaza ko mu batawe muri yombi, umwe muri bo yaje kwemera ko ari we wishe nyakwigendera, wanavuze icyatumye amuca umutwe.
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, Dr Murangira B. Thierry yagize ati “abajijwe impamvu yamwishe akamuca umutwe, yisobanuye avuga ko yagira ngo atazafatwa ngo kuko yabwiwe ko mu mboni z’uwishwe hasigaramo ifoto y’uwamwishe iyo yamwishe barebana.”
Dr Murangira avuga ko hataramenyekana niba urupfu rwa Pauline rufitany
...
ereza.
Ati “Kugeza ubu ntabwo twakwemeza cyangwa ngo duhakane ko yaba yazize ko yacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, iperereza ni ryo rizabigaragaza.”
Dr Murangira uvuga ko iri perereza riri gukorwa ari ryo rizagaragaza uyu ukekwaho kwica Pauline icyabimuteye, avuga kandi ko hakomeje gushakishwa ababa baramufashije muri iki gikorwa cy’ubunyamaswa.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha kandi rwaboneyeho kwihanganisha umuryango wa nyakwigendera, rukizeza ko ubutabera buzatangwa.
RADIOTV10

Polisi yo muri Uganda iherutse guta muri yombi abapadiri babiri bo muri Uganda bashinjwa kurenga ku mabwiriza yatanzwe na Perezida Museveni abuza amateraniro y’abasenga mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya coronavirus.
Musenyeri Gerald Kalumba wo kuri kiliziya ya Kristu Umwami mu mujyi wa Kampala yajyanywe kuri polisi y’uyu mujyi nyuma yo gusoma misa.
We yabwiye BBC dukesha iyi nkuru ko yari misa ica kuri televiziyo yari yajemo abantu 15 bonyine, abariyemo n’abahereza.
Umwe mu babibonye yabwiye BBC ko mu
... 
isoro mu majyepfo ya Uganda, undi mupadiri witwa John Bazimenyera nawe yatawe muri yombi ariho asoma misa, bivugwa ko yari irimo abantu barenga 40.
We avuga ko yari misa y’abantu bacye cyane kandi b’ababikira n’abakozi ba paruwasi gusa.
Umuvugizi wa polisi yabwiye BBC ko ibikorwa nk’ibi byo kubuza amateraniro y’abantu benshi bikomeje.
Inzego z’umutekano zashyize imbaraga mu kubuza amateraniro y’abantu benshi no gufunga ahantu harimo; utubari(bars) na za restaurant.
Kuwa gatandatu nibwo muri Ugan
...
getsi bari kugerageza kwirinda ikwirakwira ryayo hakiri kare.
Kuva umurwayi wa mbere yaboneka imipaka y’ubutaka n’ikirere ya Uganda irafunze mu rwego rwo kwirinda iyi ndwara.
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura corinavirus muri Uganda, bamaze kuba14 nyuma y’uko mu ijoro ryakeye hagaragaye abandi 5.

Ncuti zanje,
Umuntu yovuga ko afise ukwemera atagira ibikorwa vyomumarira iki? Ukwemera kwoshobora kumukiza? Nk’ubu hoza mwenewabo canke mushiki w’umwe muri twebwe, akaza yambaye ubusa canke atagira ico arya, umwe muri mwebwe akamubwira ati: «Genda amahoro, wote ususuruke, ufungure ushire inzara», ntamuhe ivyo umubiri ukeneye, mwumva vyomumarira iki?
Ukwemera na kwo ni ko k’uko: iyo kudaserutse mu bikorwa, kuba kwarapfuye im
... 
arura mu ntungane», araheza yitwa umukunzi w’Imana.
Murabona rero yuko ibikorwa ari vyo bigira umuntu intungane kandi yuko bitava ku kwemera gusa. Nkako nyene, umubiri utagira umutima uba upfuye, n’ukwemera kutagira ibikorwa kuba gupfyuye.

Icit.: Hahiriwe umuntu akorana akanyamuneza
amabwirizwa yose y’Imana.
Hahiriwe umuntu yubaha Umukama,
akorana akanyamuneza amabwirizwa yiwe;
uruvyaro rwiwe ruzoba rurangiranwa mu ntara,
umuryango w’aberanda uzohezagirwa.
Ubutunz
...
nje no ku bw’Inkuru nziza azoburokora. Mbega bimarira iki umuntu kuganza isi yose, aruhiye guta ubuzima bwiwe? Mbega, umuntu yotanga iki ngo acungure ubuzima bwiwe? uwuzoba rero yatewe isoni nanje n’amajambo yanje mu maso y’urwo rwaruka rw’abasambanyi n’abacumuzi, uyo azotera isoni Umwana w’umuntu na we, aho azozira mu buninahazwa bwa Se, hamwe n’abamarayika beranda.»
Hanyuma arababarira ati: «Ni ivy’ukuri ndabibabariye: hari bamwe bari aha batazopfa batabonye Ubwami bw’Imana bushika bukaganza.»

Amakipe azahagararira u Rwanda mu mikino ihuza amashuri yisumbuye yo mu Muryango w’Ibihugu y’Afurika y’i Burasirazuba « FEASSA 2016 » ni 18 mu bahungu n’abakobwa mu mikino 5 itandukanye.
Iyi mikino ya FEASSSA igiye kuba ku nshuro yayo ya 16 izabera mu mujyi wa Eldoret muri Kenya kuva taliki 26 Kanama kugeza 03 Nzeri 2016. Umwaka ushize iyi mikino yabereye mu Rwanda mu karere ka Huye.
Mu mupira w’amaguru u Rwanda ruzahagararirwa na Hanika TSS (Nyanza) na College de Gisenyi (Rubavu) mu bahungu; ES
... 
yarugenge) mu bahungu.
Muri Volleyball ni St Aloys (Rwamagana) na GS Indangaburezi (Ruhango) mu bakobwa, Rusumo High School (Kirehe) na APAPEN (Kirehe) mu bahungu.
Muri Netball hazagenda GS Gahini (Kayonza) naho muri Rugby hagende E T Mukingi (Ruhango). Aya makipe yose azaserukira u Rwanda azahaguruka i Kigali taliki ya 24 Kanama 2016.
Muganza Isaac waciye mu makipe atandukanye hano mu Rwanda yamaze gusinyira kuzakinira ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports amezi 6 ashobora kuzongerwa bitewe n’uko azitarwa. Uy
...
a 13 wa shampiyona, umutoza Kanamugire Aloys yagize icyo atangaza kuri iyi kipe itsinda umukino umwe (...)
Ndayisenga Valens, umukinnyi wa mbere mu Rwanda mu gusiganwa ku magare nyuma yo gusoza amasezerano ye mu ikipe ya Dimension Data for Qhubeka yamaze kubona ikipe mu gihugu cya Autriche yitwa (...)
Kuva kuri uyu wa gatandatu Taliki 14 Mutarama 2017 kuzageza kuya 05 Gashyantare 2017, abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika bagiye gukurikirana imikino y’igikombe cy’Afurika “CAN 2017” ku (...)

Police Handball Club intego yari yihaye ntiyazigezeho mu irushanwa Nyafurika yitabiriye ribera muri Burkina Faso.
Ni nyuma y’aho iyi kipe mbere yo guhaguruka mu Rwanda yari yiyemeje byibura kuzaza ku mwanya wa gatatu nyuma y’amakipe abiri ariyo Espérance de Tunis (Tunisia) na Al Ahly (Misiri).
Police Handball Club imaze gutakaza imikino yose yo mu itsinda rya mbere iherereyemo iri ku mwanya wa gatanu ari nawo wa nyuma.
Police iri mu itsinda rimwe na Minuh (Cameroun), Caiman (Congo Brazzaville),Espérance de Tunis (Tunisia) na Al Ahly (Misiri).
Imikino yose yo mutsinda police uko yitwaye
Al Ahly 43-20 Police
Police 33-36 Caiman
Police 40-12 Esperence
Minuh 44-12 Police.
Umutoza wa Police, Udahemuka Alphonse yatangarije izubarirashe.rw ko kugeza ubu bari ku mwanya wa nyuma ariko hari imikino yo mu rindi tsinda itararangira nisozwa ni nabwo haza gukorwa urutonde rwa nyuma ubundi bagahatanira imyanya guhera kuwa gatanu.
Yagize ati “ Umukino wejo twakinnye na Caiman yo muri Congo twari tuwufite mu biganza ariko tuza kuvunikisha umkinnyi wacu Jean Paul Muhawenayo bituma dutsindwa”.
Avuga ko uyu munsi bakinnye na Espérance de Tunis yo yabarushize cyane kubera ko badafite umuzamu wa mbere urwaye ndetse ashobora no kudagaragara muyindi mikino.
Akomeza avuga ko ejo ari bwo bazamenya ikipe bazahura nayo bahatanira umwanya wa gatanu n’uwa gatandatu.

Ikipe ya Polisi y’Igihugu yatangiranye umukino igitego, kuko ku munota wa kabiri gusa, Ani Elijah yacomekeye umupira mwiza Kirongozi Richard afungura amazamu.
Iyi kipe yakomeje gukina neza no guhanahana ariko amahirwe yabonwaga na Muhozi Fred na Elijah ntibayabyaze umusaruro.
Mu minota 20, Muhazi United yatangiye kwiharira umupira cyane ari nako isatira ariko ntibashe kugera imbere y’izamu rya Niyongira Patience.
Ku munota wa 30, Kirongozi yahinduye umupira imbere y’izamu, Hakizimana Muhadjiri a
... 
ra mwiza Niyitegeka Idrissa atera ishoti rikomeye cyane ari hanze y’urubuga rw’amahina, umunyezamu Niyongira umupira awushyira muri koruneri.
Iyi kipe yakomeje kwiharira umupira no gusatira cyane ariko kugera mu izamu rya Police bikaba ikibazo.
Ku munota wa 85, Police yazamutse yihuta cyane, Elijah acomekera Bigirimana Abedi umupira mwiza, acenga umunyezamu Nzana Ebini atsinda igitego cya kabiri.
Nyuma y’umunota umwe gusa, Ani Elijah yongeye kuzamuka umupira ku ruhande rw’iburyo yihuta cyane, at
...
i, mu mikino yombi iteganyijwe ku Cyumweru, tariki 29 Nzeri 2024.

Abarohowe n’abitabye Imana bose ni Abanya Ethiopia. Ibi byago bibaye nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri ubundi bwato bwari butwaye Abanya Ethiopie 38 burohamye.
Ambasaderi wa Ethiopia muri Djibouti, Berhanu Tsegaye, kuri X yavuze ko ubwo bwato bwari butwaye Abanya Ethiopia bava muri Yemen kandi ko impanuka yabereye ahitwa Godoria mu Majyaruguru y’Uburasirazuba bwa Djibouti, ndetse ko mu bantu 33 
... 
ugu byo mu Ihembe rya Afurika cyane cyane muri Ethiopia na Somalia banyura muri Djibouti, berekeza mu bihugu bya Arabia Saudite n’ibikikijwe n’ikigobe cya Aden, bajyanywe no gushaka akazi nk’uko IOM ibivuga.
Abenshi bagenda muri ubu bwato birabananira bagahera muri Yemen, aho bagorwa n’imibereho mibi abatari bake bakagwa mu mpanuka z’ubwato buvuye muri Djibouti.

...
asade ya Ethiopia yari yavuze ko ubwo bwato bwari butwaye Abanya Ethiopia bava muri Djibouti berekeza muri Yemen.
Ikibazo cy’Abimukira bagwa mu nyanja gituruka ku kuba abenshi bakoresha ubwato buba budafite ubushobozi, ndetse n’umutekano wabwo utizewe biturutse ku buremere bw’ibintu n’abantu buba bupakiye.
Kuva muri Mutarama kugeza tariki ya 21 Mata 2024, mu Bwongereza hari hamaze kwinjira abimukira 6245 bakoresheje ubwato buto. Abagera kuri 40% muri bo ni abaturutse muri Vietnam na Afghanistan.

Umugore n'umugobo ngo iyo barangura amabanga y'abubatse, umugore aryoherwa cane gusumba umugabo nkuko ubushashatsi buvyerekana.
Nkuko abahinga bavyemeza ngo ngo umuhungu niwe azana iciyumviro c'ukurangura ico gikorwa, ariko iyo batanguye canke barangije gukora ico gikorwa ngo usanga umugore ariwe aryohewe kumusumvya. Ivyo bikaba vyananditswe mu kinyamakuru c'Urubuga Yahoo.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko iyo umuhungu canke umugore akoze imibonano Mpuzabitsina neza ngo anigana ashaka kurangiza, mu gihe umugore wewe aba yishakira kuryoherwa gusa. Ivyo bikaba bishimangirwa n'akaruru canke ukuniha vyumvikana iyo ariko aragura ayo mabanga.
Ikinyamakuru dukesha ino nkuru kigaruka ku bakunda kwibaza ko uburebure bw'igitsina c'umugabo hari aho vyoba bihuriye n'ukuryoherwa k'umugore, ico kinyamakuru kivuga ko ataho bihuriye na gato.
Umugore canke umukobwa muri kamere yabo ngo ntibakora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abantu badafitiye urukundo, bikozwe ngo nta kuryoherwa bijamwo, ariko ngo harimwo urukundo ngo niho usanga vyose bihagaze.
Abantu ngo bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina umwanya atandukanye, hari abayikora umwanya muto hari n'abayikora umwanya munini, ubushashatsi bwerekana ko abantu bakora ico gikorwa hagati y'iminota 3 n'iminota 7. Ariko ngo hari n'abashobora kuyirenza ariko ngaho ngo n'umutima uba winjiye muri ico gikorwa.

Imirongo y’abaje kuriha ikori y’amazu mur’uno mwaka muri mairie ya Bujumbura iracibonekeza ku biro vya mairie ya Bujumbura. Ikiringo co gutanga iryo kori kikaba caheranye no kur’uyu wa gatandatu itariki 29 ntwarante. Abatangakori imyidogo ikaba ari myinshi ko batashoboye kwakirwa kandi bari baje mu kiringo gitegekanijwe n’amategeko.
Jean Marie Mucomwiza, arongoye igisata co kwandika mu machine abatangakori, amenyesha ko hari ingingo zafashwe kugira abatangakori bohoroherezwe kuritanga aho ni nko kwongereza amasaha y’akazi ahou bu ibiro vy’abakira abatangakori bizokwugara isaha zibiri z’ijoro mu gihe vyahora vyugara isaha cumi n’imwe zo kumugoroba.
Jean Marie Mucomwiza akaba amenyesha ko abacerewe kuriha ikori bazocibwa amande nkuko vyanditswe mu mategeko yo gutanga ikori. Ariko Jean Marie Mucowintore avuga ko abatanze amadosiye yabo ku musi wanyuma wo gutanga ikori ariwo wa gatandatu uheze abo atamande bazotangishwa. Abacerewe ukwezi kumwe bakazorihishwa amande y’ibice 10 kw’ijana y’amahera bari gutanga.

Uyu yatawe muri yombi biturutse ku butumwa yanyujije kuri Twitter avuga ko se yafashwe azira kutubahiriza amabwiriza ya COVID-19 kandi baramusanze mu rugo yinywera inzoga.
Ubu butumwa yasangije Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera bugira buti “ Mwaramutse neza CP John Bosco Kabera mu byukuri twagize ikibazo kandi hari ibyo mwadufasha, umusaza bamusanze ari kurya anafata agacupa, bamushinja kwangiza amabwiriza ya COVID-19 turabyumva bamuca ibihumbi 100Frw turayatanga ariko ngo baramufunga icyumweru kimwe.”
Polisi y’u Rwanda ibinyujije kuri Twitter yavuze ko yamutaye muri yombi nyuma yo gusanga ibyo yavuze yarabeshye.
Iti “Yafashwe nyuma yo gutangaza ko papa we yafashwe anywera inzoga mu rugo kandi yarafashwe yahinduye butiki akabari ndetse na we akarimo, binyuranyije n’amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus.”
Polisi yakomeje yibutsa abaturarwanda ko ibyo Dukuzumuremyi yakoze ari icyaha gihanwa n’amategeko. Kugeza ubu, uwafashwe afungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya Byumba.

Itegeko risinyweho nawe ubwe, rishyira Perezida Petero Nkurunziza ku rwego ’rw’umuyobozi w’ikirenga mu gukunda igihugu’ ryatangajwe uyu munsi n’ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu.
Umushinga w’iri tegeko wagiweho impaka mu nteko ishinga amategeko y’u Burundi mu kwezi gushize kwa kabiri ariko utorwa ku bwiganze.
Hari Abadepite batavuga rumwe n’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi berekanye ko batashigikiye iri tegeko rikiri umushinga.
Mu kwezi kwa mbere, bamwe mu badepite basabiye Bwana Nkurunziza na Melchior Ndaday
... 
ina ry’icyubahiro rya ’Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga mu gukunda igihugu mu Burundi’.
Iri tegeko rivuga ko uyu azajya agishwa inama mu birebana no kurengera ubwigenge, gushimangira gukunda igihugu n’ubumwe bw’igihugu.
Iri tegeko rivuga ko Bwana Nkurunziza ahawe icyo cyubahiro kubera "umuhate we udasanzwe mu kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu, gukangurira Abarundi gukunda igihugu no gushyira imbere Imana no guha agaciro umuco w’abakurambere ".
Iri tegeko rishyiraho kandi umunsi wo gukunda igihugu uzajya wizihizw
...
nzwe n’amabi atandukanye nk’ubwicanyi, kunyuruza abantu n’ibindi.
Yagize ati: "Nibaza ko iyi nteguro yabayemo abitwa ba ndisabiye barondera kweza umuntu uko atari, umukuru w’igihugu wa kino gihe ntabereye kino kidari kuko mbona ashobora mbere no kuja imbere y’intahe (inkiko)".

Mu gihe iminsi isiganye ngo ikipe y'igihugu Amavubi yerekeze muri Cape Vert gukina umukino ubanza mu guhatanira itike ya CAN 2021 ibarirwa ku ntoki, kandi nta mikino mpuzamahanga ya gicuti yateguye, bahisemo kuzakina na AS Kigali na APR FC nazo zitegura imikino nyafurika.
Nta mu kino wa gicuti mpuzamahanga u Rwanda rwateguye mbere yo gukina na Cape Vert, tariki 11 Ugushyingo 2020, nyuma y'amezi arindwi abakinnyi badakina kubera Coronavirus.
Ubuyobozi bw'Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda, bwaganirije amakipe ya AS Kigali na APR FC nayo yamaze gutangira imyitozo yitegura imikino nyafurika, bemeranywa kuzakina imikino ya gicuti hagati yabo kugira ngo bakomeze kumereza abakinnyi bazajya guhangana na Cape Vert mu mikino ibiri bari gutegura.
APR FC na AS Kigali zemeye kuzakina imikino ya gicuti n'Amavubi mbere ya tariki 08 Ugushyingo 2020.
Mu itangazo ryavuye muri CAF rimenyesha impinduka ku mukino w'u Rwanda na Cape Vert, ni uko umukino ubanza wimuriwe tariki 11 Ugushyingo 2020 i Praia, mu gihe umukino wo kwishyura uzaba tariki 17 Ugushyingo 2020 i Kigali.
U Rwanda ruri9 ku mwanya wa nyuma mu itsinda rya F ruherereyemo mu gushaka itike ya CAN2021, nyuma yo gutsindwa imikino ibiri ya mbere mu itsinda, harimo uwa Cameroun i Kigali ndetse n'uwa Mozambique i maputo.
Amavubi amaze igihe mu myitozo yitegura Cape Vert

Umutoza Jean Florent Ibenge Ikwange ukomoka muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yamaze kwandikira ubuyobozi bwa APR FC asaba guhabwa akazi ko kuyibera umutoza mukuru mu gihe kiri imbere.
Uyu mutoza w’imyaka 60 y’amavuko asanzwe atoza ikipe ya Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) yo mu gihugu cya Sudan, akaba ari umwe mu batoza bafite amateka atazibagirana ku Mugabane w’Afurika.
Amakuru yizewe twamenye ni uko Jean Florent Ibenge Ikwange muri iki cyumweru yandikiye ubuyobozi bwa APR FC kugira ngo imuhe akazi ko kuyitoza, gusa iyi kipe ntabwo ikozwa ibyo kumuha akazi bigendanye n’uko ikiri mu bibazo ifitanye na Mohammed Adil wahoze ayitoza mu myaka itatu ishize.
Jean Florent Ibenge Ikwange yavutse tariki 4 Ukuboza 1961 avukira i Leopoldville muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yabaye umukinnyi aho yari myugariro wo ku ruhande rw’ibumoso yakiniye amakipe atandukanye arimo Tennis Borussia Berlin, Excelsior Roubaix, US Boulogne na ES Wasquehal.
Kuva muri 2008 yatangiye umwuga w’ubutoza aho yanyuze mu makipe arimo ES Wasquehal, SC Douai, Shanghai Shenhua, Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Vita Club, RS Berkane na Al-Hilal Club abarizwamo ubu.
Jean-Florent Ikwange Ibengé yatwaye ibikombe bikomeye birimo CHAN ya 2016 ubwo yatozaga Congo, yatwaye ibikombe bitatu bya shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere atoza ikipe ya AS Vita Club, muri 2021-2022 yatwaranye na RS Berkane yo muri Morocco igikombe cya CAF Confederations Cup.

Natacha iyo abarizwa ku mugabane wa buraya iyo Ari mu karuhuko, yoba yikingishije ikiza ca COVID-19 giterwa n’umugera wa Coronavirus.
Ivyo bikaba vyabonetse ku mbuga nka Instagram na Facebook asanzwe akoresha. Aho yabonetse yiteza urushinge ku kubuko kw’ukubamfu.
Iryo sanamu ryakunzwe n’abatari bake rikaba ryaherekejwe n’amajambo yabonetsemwo Ijambo urucanco.
Ico gikorwa co gucandaga abanegihugu ico gihugu kibarizwa abageze mu zabukuru benshi, kikaba kikimazemwo igihe, kuko kanatsinda kiri no mu bimaze igihe bibangamiwe n’ico kiza, kuko kibatwara abatari bake.
Kandi urwo rukingo rukaba Ari kimwe mu biriko birasabwa b’ibihugu bitari bike kugira bakurekurire kwinjira mu bihugu vyabo. Ibica vyumvikana kuko Natacha akunze kuboneka mu bihugu bitari bike kubera akazi kiwe.

Ishurwe ry’iroza ritukura riri hagati ku musaraba ubengerana w’inzahabu.
Umusaraba w’inzahabu ni ikimenyetso c’ingorane n’ububabare umuntu agira mu buzima. Iroza na ryo ni ikimenyetso c’umutima w’ubwenge hamwe n’ubutore uza ugira mu ngorane zo kw’Isi.
Umuryango w’aba Roze-Krwa, ni ihuriro ry’imparanirabwenge. Ni akaranga, k’Abasokuru, indanga za Roze-Krwa, zagiye zitororokaniriza abavyipfuza aho baba hose kw’isi babicishije mu nyigisho.
... 
ira ashobore kurangura neza igikorwa yashinzwe. Umuryango yawuhaye izina rya: Antiquus Mysticusque Ordo Rosae Crucis, AMORC, ijambo kw’ijambo twovuga : Wo Hambere, kandi w’Ibanga, Umuryango w’aba Roze-Krwa). Aho kwari ukugira ngo yerekane yuko AMORC ari umuhari wo kuva kera na rindi, wavyaye wa Muryango wa Roze-Krwa, abashakashatsi b’akahise bavuga yuko watanguye mu ntango y’ikinjana ca 17. Ingwano y’Isiyose iheze, mu 1919, Umuryango, AMORC, waciye usubizwa i bototo kw’Isi yose.
Umuryango AMORC,

(1862-1918), Mariya Corelli (1864-1924), Papus (1865-1916)), Erik Satie(1866-1925), Fransisko jolivet-Castelot (1868-1937), Nikola Roerich (1874-1947), Edita Piaf (1915-1963), Ive Klein (1928-1962), n’abandi n’abandi…Muri kino gihe Umuryango AMORC ugizwe n’imparanirabwenge, n’abahinga b’ibihangange mu bumenyi no mu tugenegene, bakora mu gacerere ata nzamba ziriwe zira-vuga.

Arnold Schwarzenegger, yakoze impanuka y’imodoka ubwo yari mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Iyi mpanuka yakozwe n’imodoka enye zagonganye ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatanu. Ntibyigeze bitangazwa niba yaba yatewe n’ubusinzi cyangwa se ubundi burangare.
Amashusho yakwirakwiriye agaragaza imodoka nini ya SUV iri hejuru y’izindi ebyiri mu masangano y’ahitwa Brentwood. Agaragaza Schwarzenegger ahagaze hafi aho.
Ku rundi ruhande, TMZ yatangaje ko Schwarzenegger ariwe wakoze amakosa mu muhanda, ko iyo modoka ya SUV yuriye izindi nto za Sedan ari ye.
Schwarzenegger yari atwaye Yukon SUV ubwo yuriraga Toyota Prius n’indi Porsche Cayenne.
Umugore wari utwaye Prius yakomeretse ku mutwe, ahita ajyanwa kwa muganga. Bivugwa ko Schwarzenegger yagumye aho impanuka yabereye, agafata na nimero z’uwakomeretse ku buryo yakomeje gukurikirana uko amerewe.
Schwarzenegger usibye kuba ari Umukinnyi wa filimi w’ikirangirire ku Isi, yigeze no kuba Guverineri wa California.
Umuvugizi wa Schwarzenegger yatangaje ko uyu mugabo nta kibazo yagiriye muri iyo mpanuka.

Igihugu c’Uburusiya kimenyesha ko cagavye ibitero vyinshi vy’amabombe umuhari wa Etat Islamique muri Siriya. Minisitiri w’ukwivunabansi w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yamenyesheje Perezida wiwe Vladimir Putin kumusi wa gatanu ko indege z’intambara z’Uburusiya zasambuye ibibanza 15 uwo muhari ucukuriramwo ibitoro. Yavuze ko basambuye kandi ibiduga birenga 500 bitwara igitoro mur’iyi ndwi.
Shoigu avuga ko byakozwe mu ntumbero yo guhasha uwo muhari no kuwucira amavomo yose umuramwo amafaranga ukoresha mubikorwa vy’iterabwoba. Minisititi Shoigu yamenyesheje kandi ko ubwato bw’intambara bw’Uburusiya bwarungitse misile 18 kubarwanyi ba reta ya Islamike mu ntara za Raqqa, Idlib and Aleppo. Ahatewe ibibanza 7 birimwo abo barwanyi.
Uyu minisitiri amenyesha kandi ko ibitero vy’indege vyahitanye abarwanyi bashika amajana atandatu mu ntara ya Deir ez-Zour iri mu buseruko bwa Siriya. Yasobnauye ko ari ukwihora ku bitero uwo muhari wiyemereye ko wakoze mu gukorora indege y’Uburusiya muri Misiri n’ibiheruka kubera I Paris kuwa gatanu uheze.

Umukandida w’Umudemokrate, Hillary Clinton, yasubiye kubandanya igikorwa ciwe c’ukwiyamamaza. Ivyo bibaye inyuma yuko aruhutse, mu kiringo c’imisi itatu, kubera yari yarwaye indwara y’umusonga. Yamara Uwo bahiganwa w’Umurepublika, Donald Trump, yavuze ko Hillary Clinton, ata nguvu afise.
Hillary Clinton Yagiye uno musi ku wa kane muri Reta ya Carolina yo mu buraruko, aho abo bakandida bageranye cane mw’ihiganwa. Bompi uko ari babiri baragendeye iyo Reta, incuro zitari nke, mu gikorwa cabo c’ukwiyamamaza. Mu nyuma yaho araza gushikiriza ijambo abayobozi b’Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Amerika yo mu bumanuko, i Washington DC, ari kumwe na prezida Barack Obama, umwe mu bantu bamuvugira cane. Donald Trump, yashikirije ijambo mu gisagara ca New York, imbere yuko aja amuri Reta ya New Hampshire, iri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Hillary Clinton, asubiye kubandanya gikorwa ciwe c’ukwiyamamaza, inyuma yuko afashwe n’umusonga mu mpera z’indwi iheze, mu gisagara ca New York. Umuganga wiwe avuga ko ariko atora mitende neza. Amenyesha ko ata kibazo c’amagara afise cotuma ataba prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Abajejwe igikorwa c’ukwiyamamaza ca Hillary Clinton, bashize ahabona ivyavuye mw’isuzumwa ryiwe ryagizwe n’umuganga wiwe mu ndwi iheze.
Batangaza ko ayandi makuru yerekeye amagara yiwe azoshirwa ahabona mu misi ya vuba.

Minisiteri y’Ubuzima (MINISANTE), yafashe icyemezo cyo gufunga Baho International Hospital, nyuma y’igihe gito bivuzwe ko ibyo bitaro byarangaranye umurwayi bituma yitaba Imana.
Kigalitoday ivuga ko ayo makuru akimara kumenyekana, Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) ndetse na MINISANTE, batangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekane icyateye urwo rupfu rwabaye ku ya 9 Nzeri 2021.
Mu gihe iperereza ryatangiraga gukorwa kandi, abaganga babiri bo muri ibyo bitaro byo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, bafashwe na RIB barafungwa.
Icyo kibazo cyabaye muri ibyo bitaro mu gihe n’ubundi hari hashize iminsi ababigana banditse ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, bavuga ko bidatanga serivisi nziza, bigera n’aho ubuyobozi by’ibyo bitaro busaba imbabazi kubera ko batakiriye abkiriya babo uko bikwiye.

Bukuru Christophe umukinnyi mushya wa Rayon Sports, avuga ko yashimishijwe cyane no kongera kwisanga yambaye umwenda w’ubururu n’umweru nyuma y’igihe kinini avuye muri iyi kipe, avuga ko intego ari ugutwara igikombe kandi bazagitwara.
Tariki ya 1 Mutarama 2022, Rayon Sports nibwo yatangaje ko yamaze gusinyisha umukinnyi Bukuru Christophe waherukaga muri iyi kipe mu mwaka wa 2019.
Bukuru Christophe wari umaze amezi 9 nta kipe afite, yavuze ko yishimiye kongera kugaruka muri iyi kipe ndetse ko yasanze ifite abakinnyi beza n’abatoza beza.
Ati “Ni byiza, ndishimye, ni ibintu bishimishije urabona ko ikipe ari nziza, abakinnyi beza, abatoza beza, ni ibintu bishimishije kubona umufana. Ni umuryango mwiza, dufite abakinnyi bashaka gukina.”
Yakomeje avuga ko akurikije uko yasanze bagenzi be, yizeye ko igikombe bazacyegukana kuko bafite umutima wo gushyira hamwe.
Ati “Nasanze bafite ishyaka ryinshi, intego ni igikombe kandi tuzayigeraho, ni ngombwa tuzagitwara icyizere kirahari. Nishimiye kugaruka muri Rayon Sports ni ibintu bishimishije.”
Nyuma yo kugaruka muri Rayon Sports, Bukuru Christophe yagaragaye mu mukino wa gicuti Rayon Sports yanganyijemo na Police FC 1-1 ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize.
Muri 2019 nibwo Bukuru Christophe yatandukanye na Rayon Sports yerekeza muri APR FC, iyi kipe yaje kumuhagarika muri Gicurasi 2021 kubera ikibazo cy’imyitwarire mibi. Yari yasinyiye Rayon Sports avuye muri Mukura VS.

Ikigo cy’ igihugu cy’ubuzima RBC kimaze gutangaza ko umuntu wese wikekaho icyorezo cya coronavirus; ajya kwa muganga bakamusuzuma ku buntu cyangwa agahamagara 114; abaganga bakamusuzuma ku buntu.
Nyuma y’amakuru yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga avuga ko kwisuzumisha coronavirus bisaba kwishyura amafaranga y’umurengera.
Dr Josée Nyamusore, ukuriye ishami rishinzwe indwara z’ibyorezo muri RBC yavuze ko umuntu wiketseho coronavirus arimo gusuzumwa ku buntu, icyo akora ni uguhamagara 114 kugira ngo ababishinzwe bamusange aho ari bamutware ataba yaranduye akanduza abantu mu nzira ajya kwa muganga.
Mu kiganiro Dr Nyamusore yagiranye na RBA, yagize ati “Iyo umuntu yaragaragaje ko akekwaho coronavirus baramufata akagenda, twongera kumubona nyuma y’amasaha igisubizo bakimuha, nta muntu wishyura, ni Ubuntu ni Leta yashoyemo imari rwose”.
Dr. Nyamusore yavuze ko abarwayi bashya bose bagaragaye ari abijyanye kwa muganga n’abahamagaye ku 114; Imbangukiragutabara zikabajyana kwa muganga bagasuzumwa.

...

01 Imiti ya buri munsi yamashanyarazi (HPMC) Hydroxypropyl methyl selulose
Ibicuruzwa bya HPMC byashizweho kugirango byuzuze ibisabwa byogusabwa kuva kumesa no kumesa kugeza kumashanyarazi ya pompe ya aerosol. HPMC itanga ihagarikwa noguhindura ibintu bidashonga byemerera gukora sisitemu yo kumesa neza kandi neza. Molekules ya HPMC ifite emulisitiya kandi ikingira imiterere ya colloid. Bakora nka emulisiferi, abahindura rheologiya hamwe na stabilisateur ya furo muri formula de detergent, kugirango batange neza kandi bigaragare neza.

Uko umwaka utashe kw’igenekerezo rya 8 Ntwarante, Uburundi burifatanya n’amakungu mu guhimbaza Umusi Mukuru Mpuzamakungu wahariwe umukenyezi kw’ isi yose.
Uwo musi, ni akaryo ku ma Leta yose yo kw’ isi, n’iyo iwacu idasigaye inyuma, ko kurimbura intambwe dushitseko mu guteza imbere umukenyezi, haba mu vy’imibano, politike no muvyo ubutunzi. Uwo musi kandi ni naho ibihugu bifatira mu kwiha irindi hangiro ryo gushira mu ngiro amategeko, amasezerano n’imigambi bijanye no guteza imbere umukenyezi. K
... 
za isabukuru rigira 25 hemejwe indinganizo y’ibikorwa vyo guteza imbere Umukenyezi yemerejwe i Beijing mu gihugu c’Ubushinwa; guhimbaza isabukuru igira mirongo 20 hemejwe ingingo ya 1325 y’akanama kajejwe umutekano k’Ishirahamwe Mpuzamakungu ONU; guhimbaza imyaka itanu hemejwe amahangiro 17 y’iterambere kw’isi; ukaba kandi uhuriranye n‘uko hasihaye amezi make ngo twinjire mu matora y’igihugu, uruhara rw’umukenyezi narwo rukaba ntangere.
Ibitari bike biramaze kurangurwa mu ntumbero yo guteza imbe
...
’abakenyezi mu nzego zose zifatirwamwo ingingo, n’ibindi.
Uku kwezi kwose kwa Ntwarante, guhariwe umukenyezi. Ibikorwa bitari bike birategekanijwe kurangurwa.
Ibirori vyo guhimbaza uwo musi mukuru bizobera mu ntara ya Gitega, umurwa mukuru wa politique, ku kibuga c’umupira i Ngoma, igenekerezo rya 9 Ntwarante 2020.
Duhamagariye abenegihugu bose; abagabo, abakenyezi n’urwaruka, ababa mu gisagara ca Gitega no mu ntara zose z’igihugu babishoboye, bazosidukane n’iyonka mu birori vy’uwo munsi Mukuru.

Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y'u Rwanda imaze kwemeza itegeko rikuraho Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo Kurwanya Jenoside; Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge; Itorero ry’Igihugu ndetse n’itegeko rikuraho ikigega cya Leta gishinzwe gutera inkunga abarokotse Jenoside batishoboye FARG.
Mu Burundi komisiyo y'igihugu ishinzwe uburenganzira bwa muntu CNIDH iramagana ibikorwa byo guhungabanya umutekano bimaze iminsi bigaragara muri icyo gihugu. By'umwihariko iravuga ku bitero bya grenade bimaze iminsi bigaragara mu mujyi wa Bujumbura, n’imitego y'ibisasu byo mu mihanda byahitanye abantu barenga 10, abandi barenga 100 bagakomereka mu gihe cy'ibyumweru bibiri.

Akes yashize hanze amasanamu y’akaririmbo “Urabaruta”
Mu majambo y’ukwinginga n’ugushima, Akes yahayagije umwigeme mu karirimbo Urabaruta yanasohoreye amasanamu.
Akaririmbo vyavuzwe ko Lolilo yoba yararabiyeko mu gukora akaririmbo kiwe aheruka gukora kamaze gusohoka. Ako nako n’akaririmbo k”umuririmvyi Akes Don.
Ako karirimbo kasohotse haraheze imisi kakaba kakozwe na Brian Smith umwe mu bahinyanyuzi bariko bavyifatamwo neza muri kino gihe.
Ur’indirimbo ndirimba buri kanya,
ni wewe jambo namiza mu kanywa,
igisabisho nsaba umukama,
nuko tworambana mu rugo rwacu tuvyare n’abana.
Ako karirimbo kakaba kiswe Urabaruta, muriko Akes akaba agaruka ku vyiza abona kuri mwigeme, akanavuga ku vyiza agiye gukorera uwo mwigeme.

Na kare tuvuga duti : « Nemera kandi Mutima Mweranda Umukama, ari we Sôko ry’ubuzima, akomoka kuri Data na Mwana. Arasanegwa kandi araninahazwa nk’uko bigirirwa Data na Mwana. Ni we yavugiye mu bahanuzi ».
Egome cane bavukanyi, Pentikoti ni umusi mukuru w’uguken
... 
kuyāga ivyiza vy’Imana.
« Twese twumva bahaya mu ndimi zacu ivyiza vy’Imana »
Bavukanyi,
Uwu Mutima abatumwa baronse yabaye Mutima w’Ubutwari (Abanyaroma 8,14-17) kuko abari biyugaranye ku gutinya Abayuda, ng’aba barashize ubwoba, bagiye ahabona, batanguye kuvugira Imana. Ni ivy’ukuri bavukanyi, aho Mutima w’Imana atari, abantu barakanya, bagatinyabkuvuga ico bazi, ariko cane cane bakabura amahoro, abantu bagatinyana, mbere bagateba baja kwāka indaro mu bwami bw’íbikôkó, kugutinya abantu nka bo.
...
mudasa canke mudasangiye ibi na biriya, ariko muhamagariwe gusangira ijambo, gusangira umitwarariko w’ukuremesha amahoro. Ng’ico igicumuro cacu, ng’ico duhamagarirwa kugwanya muri twebwe uyu musi, ng’ico ico duhamagariwe kugwanya no muri bene wacu, twese duhwanire guhaya Izina ry’Imanq, dukenguruka ivyiza itugirira.
Tubisabiranire, dusabiranire kwemera kwakira uwo Mutima yageranya abantu n’abandi, gutyo dushire ubwoba, turonke umwidegemvyo nyakuri, turonke amahoro.
Umusi mukuru Mwiza kuri mwese.

Abakozi bajejwe iperereza, ba Reta ya Amerika, barahagaritse, Bubo Na Tchuto, yahoze ayoboye igisirikare kirwanira mu maz,i mu gihugu ca Guinee-Bissau, Amerika yatangaje kw’ari umuntu akomeye cane, mu bucuruzi bw’ibiyarura umutwe, mu makungu.
Inkuru zivuye mu mazinga ya Cap-Vert, zamenyesheje, Ijwi rya Amerika, Service y’Igiportugais, ko Bubo Na Tchuto, yazanywe muri ayo mazinga, ejo ku musi wa kane, akaba yashizwe mu ndege yamujanye, muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ikinyamakuru co mu mazinga ya Cap-Vert, catangaje kw’ubwato, Bubo Na Tchuto, yarimwo, bwafashwe hafi y’amazinga ya Cap-Vert.
Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zatangaje ko, Na Tchuto, yagize uruhara, mu budandaji bw’ibiyayura umutwe, mu makungu, n’ubudandaji bwa cocaine ivuye, mu karere ko muri Amerika yo mu bumanuko.
Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga kandi ko ariwe yatuma haba uruhagarara, mu gihugu ca Guinee-Bissau

Umutwe wa M23 wongeye gukozanyaho n’ingabo z’igisirikare cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (FARDC) mu ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru, mu gace ka Rutshuru.
Umwe mu bayobozi bo muri Rutshuru yavuze ko M23 yagabye ibitero ku birindiro by’ingabo za Congo, nazo zigasubiza.Icyakora, M23 ibinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo yatangaje ko ariyo yashotowe na FARDC, ikirwanaho.
Umutwe wa M23 hashize amezi ane ifashe umujyi wa Bunagana uri hafi y’umupaka wa RDC na Uganda.
M23 ishinja Leta ya Congo kwirengagiza amasezerano y’amahoro bagiranye no gukomeza gutoteza abavuga Ikinyarwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Imirwano ibaye nyuma y’iminsi ingabo za Kenya zoherejwe muri ako gace gufasha iza Congo guhangana n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro. Ntabwo biramenyekana niba ingabo za Kenya nazo ziri mu mirwano ku ruhande rwa Congo.

Igipolisi ca Uganda kivuga ko ata muntu n’umwe gifata kimuhoye ubwoko canke ubwenegihugu, ngo abafatwa bose baba bakekwako ivyaha ngo kandi hariho n’abanye Uganda.
Amakuru atangazwa n’ikinyamakuru co mu Rwanda cegereye ubutegetsi, igihe.com, avuga ko ibikorwa vy’ubugizi bwa nabi ku Banyarwanda bakorera muri Uganda bikomeje kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi, aho abadatawe muri yombi baba bahigwa bukware.
Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko abo bantu bahigwa n’inzego z’iperereza zo muri Uganda, urwego rushinzwe ubutasi bwa gisirikare co kimwe n’urwego rushinzwe umutekano wo mu gihugu hagati.
Mu ndwi iheze bavuze ko hafashwe abantu mirongo ibiri na babiri.
Mugenzi wacu Prime Ndikumagenge yavuganye n’umuvugizi w’igipolisi ca Uganda, Emiliane Kayima, atangura amubaza umubare w’abo bamaze gufata n’ico babafatira.

Gasogi United yavuze ko Mazimpaka André yayisinyiye amasezeramo y’umwaka umwe ariko ashobora kongerwa.
Iti: "Mazimpaka Andre wari umunyezamu w’ikipe ya Rayon Sports yasinyiye Gasogi United amasezeramo y’umwaka umwe ushobora kongerwa."
Mazimpaka André yinjiye muri Gasogi United nk’umusimbura wa Kwizera Olivier wayisohotsemo mu kwezi gushize akerekeza muri Rayon Sports. Mazimpaka agomba kwishakamo uzajya abanza mu kibuga hagati ye na Cyuzuzo Aimé Gaël usanzwe muri Gasogi.
Mazimpaka André yari umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports kuva muri Mutarama 2018, nyuma yo kuyigeramo avuye mu kipe ya Musanze FC yo mu majyaruguru y’igihugu.
Uyu muzamu wanakiniye ikipe ya Mukura VS ndetse n’amakipe atandukanye yo mu mujyi wa Kigali, ni umwe mu bafashije cyane Rayon Sports gutwara igikombe cya Shampiyona y’umwaka wa 2018/2019 nyuma yo kungukira ku makosa ya Bashunga Abouba.
Mazimpaka yari yararangije amasezeramo yari afitanye na Rayon Sports, gusa ahitamo gutandukana na yo nyuma yo kubona ubuyobozi bwayo bugenda biguru ntege mu bijyanye no kumwongerera amasezerano, ndetse no gusanga nta bushake bufite bwo kumuha ibyo yabusabaga.

Nyuma yo gutandukana na Petro Atlético de Luanda yo muri Angola,umukinnyi w’ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi, Jacques Tuyisenge amaze gusinyira ikipe ya APR FC amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri.
Jacques Tuyisenge wamenyekanye mu ikipe ya Gor Mahia FC agarutse mu Rwanda nyuma yo gukinira amakipe atandukanye nka Kiyovu Sports, Etincelles ndetse na Police FC yavuyemo yerekeza hanze. Yavuye mu Rwanda aguzwe n’ikipe ya Gor Mahia tariki 13 Mutarama 2016.
Tuyisenge yiyongereye ku bakinnyi b’abanyarwanda bari kugaruka mu gihugu ku bwinshi. Tuyisenge w’imyaka 29 akurikiye Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste (Migi) mu bakinnyi baheruka gusinyira APR FC bavuye hanze y’u Rwanda usibye ko Migi we yahise asubirayo.

Umukinnyi wa Manchester United ukina mu mutima wa defanse [ centre-back] Jonny Evans yamaze gutangaza ko asezeye mu ikipe y’igihugu nyuma y’imyaka 20.
Uyu mugabo ukomoka muri Ireland y’Amajyaruguru, yatangiye guhamagarwa mu ikipe ye y’igihugu kuva mu mwaka 2004 mu mu ikipe y’abato y’abatarengeje imyaka 17. Nyuma y’imyaka 2 ibiri gusa yahise atangira guhamagarwa mu kiciro cy’abatarengeje imyaka 21, aha hari mu 2006.
Muri uyu mwaka nibwo yahise aninjira mu ikipe nkuru. Kuva mu makipe y’abato, ikipe ye y’igihugu yayikiniye imikino 118 ayitsindira ibitego 7. Kuva mu mwaka 2022 akinira ikipe y’igihugu niwe wari umuyobozi [captain] wa bagenzi be.
Jonny Evans yakiniye amakipe arimo Royal Antwerp, Sunderland, West Bromwich Albion, Leicester City na Manchester United akinira kuri ubu. Iyi yayibayemo hagati 2006–2015 yongera kuyigarukamo mu 2023.

Mu gihe ikipe ya Manchester United mu mikino iherutse gukina uko ari ibiri yose yayitsinzwe,hakomeje kwibazwa niba ari ubushobozi buke bw’umutoza cyangwa ubw’abakinnyi bahenze yaguze bakaba barananiwe gukora icyabazanye,abakinnyi bakanyujijeho muri iyi kipe biciye mu mugabo ubahagarariye Paul Scholes
Paul scholes yagize ati:”Ndakeka ko Mourinho akeneye gukomeza ikipe ye cyane cyane hagati mu kibuga bitewe nuko Paul Pogba waguzwe akeneye abantu bari ku rwego rumwe nawe akaba abona umuti ntahandi wava uretse mu ikipe ya Real Madrid ku bakinnyi 2 Toni Kroos

Nyuma yaho ikipe ya Villareal yo muri Esipanye itandukanye n’uwari umutoza wayo Javier Calleja azira umusaruro muke yagejeje kuri iyi kipe muri uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019-2020 iyo kipe yahise imusimbuza Unai Emery, wahoze atoza ikipe ya Arsenal
Ibyo gusimbuza Javier muri yi kipe bibaye nyuma yaho ku munsi wo kuwa kabiri w’iki cyumweru ari bwo uyu mutoza yatandukanye na Villareal nyuma y’umwaka umwe yari ayimazemo nk’umutoza mukuru aho ashoje uyu mwaka asize iyi kipe ku mwanya wa gatanu ndetse ikaba izakina imikino ya Europa League umwaka utaha.
Muri Villareal Javier Calleja Revilla w’imyaka 42 y’amavuko yasezerewe nyuma yaho mu mikino 66 yahatoje mu marushanwa atandukanye, yatsinze imikino 22 anganya indi mikino 12 mu gihe yatsinzwe imikino 22.
Umutoza mushya Unai Emery yasinyiye kuzatoza iyi kipe mu gihe cy’imyaka cy’imyaka itatu iri imbere.
Uyu mutoza Emery ahawe gutoza Villareal nyuma yaho tariki ya 29 Ugushyingo 2019 ari bwo yatandukanye n’ikipe ya Arsenal.

Mugihe abantu muri Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika bariko bihereza amabarabara biyamiriza gutandukanya abana b’abimukira ku bavyeyi binjiye ku mbibe mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko, abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe w’Abarepublikani bariko barategura integuro y’itegeko rihagarika gutandukanya imiryango.
Iyo nteguro y’itegeko yateguwe n’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka Paul Ryan, itegeka ko abana binjira baciye ku mbibe n’abavyeyi, basubizwa abavyeyi babo, bakagumana aho bazoba bapfungiwe.
Ryan yavuze ko adashigikiye gutandukanya imiryango itagira ivyangombwa ku mbibe z’Amerika.
Aho ni mugihe ubutegetsi bwa Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika butegekanya kwongera kwugurura amahema yo kwakira abana b’abimukira batandukanijwe n'abavyeyi.

Col Nshimiyamana Augustin wari uzwi ku kazina ka “Bora Manasseh” wahoze akuriye iperereza ryo hanze muri FDLR yahaye ubutumwa bukomeye FDLR na FARDC ko ibyo gutera u Rwanda ari ukwiyahura.
Col Nshimiyimana umaze gusubizwa mu buzima busanzwe nyuma yo kurangiza amahugurwa I Mutobo yagarutse ku bufatanye bwa FARDC na FDLR mu kurwanya M23 yibutsa FDLR ko uyu munsi ifasha FARDC ejobundi ikayitera.
Ibi yabivuze kuri uyu wa kane ubwo yari mu kigo cya Mutobo aho yagarutse ku buzima bwe mu mashyamba ya K
... 
irangwa mu mitwe ifatanya na FARDC ariyo Nyatura na APCLS. Yagize ati “Nyatura tuyishinga kwari ugukorana na FDLR kuko ari abahutu b’abakongomani”
Col Nshimiyimana avuga mubishuka FDLR ari amasasu n’imbunda igisirikari cya Kongo kijya kiyiha ariko abibutsa ko intwaro atarizo zifata igihugu gusa.
Yongeyeho ko gutera u Rwanda ari ukwiyahura kuko nta makuru bafite kuri RDF igisirikari cy’u Rwanda.Yavuze ko nk’umuntu wari ushinzwe iperereza nawe nta makuru yari afite ariko ageze mu Rwanda yatangajwe
...
usengero, nk’uko byatangajwe nuwo mutwe igihe yafatwaga
Col Nshimiyimana yabaye uwungirije ushinzwe iperereza muri FDLR hagati ya 2011 na 2019, yafatiwe mu gace kitwa Rubaya ka teritwari ya Masisi mu ntara ya Kivu ya ruguru, nk’uko umuvugizi wa FDLR abivuga.
Icyo gihe ‘Curé Ngoma’ wari umuvugizi wa FDLR yabwiye BBC ati: “Ni byo baraje bamusanga aho yari yagiye mu birori byo kubatirisha umwana we baramufata”. Ngoma avuga ko aho Nshimiyimana yafatiwe yari yahagiye mu bikorwa by’umuryango we bwite.

Abategetsi ba Tanzaniya batanguye gutanga amazi mu gisagara c’ubutunzi, Dar es Salaam.
Ibikorwa vyaraye bitanguye bigamije guhangana n’ikena ry’amazi ryatewe n’igabanuka ry’ayari mu ruzi Ruvu. Amazi akoreshwa mu gisagra ca Dar es Salaam n’imicungararo yaco ahanini ava muri urwo ruzi rutera rwuma.
Amazi yo mu ruzi, Ruvu, ruriko ruruma yavuye ku mariyoni y’amaritiro 466 ku munsi, aja ku mamiriyoni 300. Abajejwe ivy’amazi muri Tanzaniya bemeza ko Dar es Salaam yonyene ikoresha amamiriyoni y’amaritiro 500 ku munsi.
Igisata kijejwe gutanga amazi muri Tanzaniya, DAWASA, caburiye ababa mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam kibabwira ko bagiye kumara amasaha 24 ata n’ima babona mu mazu yabo.
Ico gisata cumvikanisha ko ku ndwi ku ndwi kizoza kiravuga ryari amazi aboneka na ryari ataboneka, bivanye n’uko azoja ariyongera mu ruzi, Ruvu. Ntibigeze batanga isango rya ryari bibaza iki kibazo kizokemuka.
Abahinga mu vyo kugendereza ibirere, berekana ko ubugararwa n’ikena ry’imvura bigiye kwibasira Tanzaniya n’ibihugu bibanyi vyayo vyo mu karere ka Afurika y’ubuseruko.

NBA: Miami Heat yatsinze Boston Celtics ku mukino wa nyuma.
Miami Heat yabonye itike yo gukina umukino wa nyuma muri shampiyona ya Basket yo muri Amerika itsinze Boston Celtics ku mukino wa 7 amanota 101-88. Miami Heat ikazakina na Oklahoma Thunder yabaye iyambere I burengerazuba itsinze San Antonio ku mukino wa nyuma.
Mu mukino wari utegerejwe n’abakunzi ba Basket benshi aho amakipe yombi yanganyaga imikino 3-3, Miami niyo yabyitwayemo neza ku kibuga cyayo isezerera Boston Celtics.
Iyi ntsinzi Miami ikaba iyikesha ibyamamare 3 byayo Lebron James, Dwayne Wade na Chris Bosh bazonze ikipe ya Boston Celtics.
Boston Celtics yarangije igice cya mbere irusha Miami ntiyakomeje kwitwara neza mu minota ya nyuma ari naho Miami yayisigiye.
Miami Heat yongeye kugera ku mukino wa nyuma mu myaka ibiri yikurikiranya dore ko umwaka ushize yatwawe igikombe na Dallas.
Imikino ya nyuma izatangira kuwa kabiri ubwo Miami izaba yerekeje ku kibuga cya Oklahoma mu mukino wa mbere.
Dore uko abakinnyi batsinze:
Miami Heat: Lebron James 31
Dwayne Wade 23
Chris Bosh 19
Boston Celtics: Rojon Rondo 22
Paul Pierce 19
Brandon Bass 16
Rutaganda Ponny.

Ubuyobozi bw’Ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports imaze iminsi ivugwamo ibibazo birimo iby’amikoro, bwahagaritse Niyonzima Olivier uzwi nka Sefu, imikino yose isigaye ya Shampiyona.
Iki cyemezo cy’ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe ya Kiyovu Sports, gikubiye mu ibaruwa yagiye hanze kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 12 Werurwe 2024.
Iyi baruwa yandikiwe Niyonzima Olivier, Kiyovu Sports itangira yibutsa ibikubiye mu masezerano bagiranye tariki 01 Kanama 2023, birimo inshingano yahawe.

Leta ya Sudani yashyizeho Ambasaderi wayo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akaba abaye uwa mbere woherejweyo nyuma y’imyaka 24 ibihugu byombi birebana ay’ingwe.
Noureldin Sati wagizwe Ambasaderi yakoze irimo itandukanye. Yabaye umwe mu bakozi b’ubutumwa bw’amahoro bw’Umuryango.
w’Abibumbye mu Rwanda mu myaka ya 1990.
Ishyirwaho rya Noureldin ryaje mu gihe ibihugu byombi bitangiye kubyutsa umubano nyuma y’ihirikwa ku butegetsi rya Omar al Bashir wahoze ayobora Sudani.
Ubutegetsi bwa Sudani na Amerika bwatangiye kuzamo agatotsi mu 1996. Muri uwo mwaka Amerika yafunze Ambasade yayo i Khartoum ishinja Sudani gutera inkunga imitwe y’iterabwoba.
Amerika yongeye gufungura ambasade yayo mu 2002 ariko ibihugu byombi ntibyigeze bishyiraho ba ambasaderi, ahubwo ambasade zabaga zihagarariwe n’abashinzwe ibikorwa, Chargés d’affaires.
Mu Ukuboza umwaka ushize Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Sudani, Abdalla Hamdok, yasuye Amerika ndetse ibihugu byombi byemera gushyiraho ba ambasaderi.

Umutegetsi wo mu gihugu ca Kongo yatangaje ko abanyamahanga babiri bakorera isosiyete yo mu gihugu ca Canada yitwa Banro yimba ubutare, banyurujwe mu ndwi iheze mu bumanuko bw’intara ya Maniema, iri mu buseruko bw’igihugu.
Umuvugizi w’igisirikare mu ntara ya Kivu, Capitaine Dieudonne Kasereka, kuri uyu wa mbere yavuze ko umunyagihugu ava muri Afrika y’Epfo, umunyazimbabwe hamwe n’abanyekongo babiri banyurujwe, kandi ko ababanyuruje, bashobora kuba ari abarwanyi bo mu muhari w’aba Mai-Mai, bakorera ibikorwa vyayo vy’ubugizi bwa nabi muri iyo ntara.
Yavuze ko abasirikare bariko bararondera abo bantu banyurujwe, kandi ko abantu batatu bikekwa ko bafise uruhara muri iryo nyuruzwa bamaze guhagarikwa.
Yavuze kandi ko gushika ubu, abakoze iryo bara, ataco barasaba kugira basubize abo bantu.

Itangazo ryasinyweho na Dr Emile Bienvenue uyobora Rwanda FDA, rivuga ko puderi ya ‘Johnson’s baby powder’ ikoze mu kinyabutabure cya ‘talcum’, yahagaritswe mu ngano y’amacupa yose yari isazwe icururizwamo. Abanyarwanda basabwe guhagarika kugura no gukoresha iyo bari baraguze yose. Abayicuruzaga bose basabwe kuyisubiza aho bayiranguye, uhereye igihe itangazo ryasohokeye, tariki 17 Kameana 2023.
Ikigo Rwanda FDA kandi cyategetse abinjiza mu gihugu ibinoza n’ibisukura umubiri bose, kugiha raporo mu gihe kitarenze iminsi 10 itangazo risohotse, igaragaza uko gukuzanya iyi puderi bihagaze ndetse n’ingano y’iyo bari bagifite.
Impavu yatanzwe kuri iki cyemezo, ngo byatwewe n’ibaruwa Rwanda FDA yandikiwe n’ubuyobozi bw’uruganda rwa Johnson & Johnson rukora iyi puderi, ivuga ko bahagaritse gukora iyi puderi y’abana ikoze mu kinyabutabire cya ‘Talcum’, kugira ngo batangire gukora ikoze mu bikomoka ku bigori.
Nanone kandi iyi puderi ya ‘Johnson’s baby powder’ imaze gukurwa ku masoko y’ibindi bihugu bitandukanye.

Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika ivuga ko itazokwifatanya n’amakungu mu mugambi wo gukorera hamwe no kugabanganya ku buringanire bungana kw’isi yose urukingo rwa COVID-19 kuko ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryita ku magara y’abantu OMS ari ryo rirongoye uwo mugambi.
Ibihugu birenga 170 biri mu biganiro vyo kugira uruhara muri uyo mugambi wo gusabikanya urwo rukingo, wiswe COVAX, rurongowe na OMS hamwe n’ishirahamwe Gavi, ryashinzwe n’ikigo c’umugwizatunga w’umunyamerika Bill Gate. Ikigo Gavi kijejwe gucandaga abana bo mu bihugu bikenye kw’isi.
Umuvugizi wo muri perezidanse ya Amerika, White House, Judd Deere yavuze ko Amerika izobandanya gukorana n’amakungu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, ariko ko batazokorana n’ishirahamwe OMS hamwe n’Ubushinwa vyabunzwe na ruswa.
Perezida Donald Trump yatangaje mu kwezi kwa ndwi ko akuye Amerika muri OMS, mu kuvuga ko iryo shirahamwe ryavyifashemwo nabi kuva COVID-19 yaduka kandi ryerekanye ko ryegamiye Ubushinwa, aho uwo mugera waturutse mu mpera z’umwaka uheze.
Ubushikiranganji bw’Amerika bujejwe imigenderanire n’amakungu bwavuze kuri uyu wa gatatu ko intererano yo mu 2020 y’imiliyoni 62 z’amadolari Amerika yari isigaje gutanga muri OMS uyu mwaka azorungikwa gufasha mu mafaranga ONU ikoresha.
Amerika ivuga ko izindi ntererano zo muri kazoza zogenda muri OMS zizohabwa abandi bakorana yise abizigirwa.

Kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki ya 10 Ukuboza, ku cyicaro gikuru cya Polisi y’u Rwanda ku Kacyiru, umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi IGP Emmanuel K.Gasana yakiriye abapolisikazi 13 bavuye mu butumwa bw’amahoro mu gihugu cya Cote d’Ivoire.
Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Marie Josée Zaninka wari uyoboye aba bapolisi, yashimye Polisi y’u Rwanda yabohereje, avuga ko bahakuye ubunararibonye, bikaba bizabafasha mu kazi kabo ka buri munsi, akaba yavuze ko ubumenyi bahakuye bagiye kubusangiza bagenzi babo.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda IGP Emmanuel K. Gasana yabifurije ikaze mu Rwanda no muri Polisi y’u Rwanda by’umwihariko, abashimira uko bitwaye mu kazi n’uko bagakoze neza, abashimira uburyo babanye neza aho bari mu mahanga ndetse n’uko bahesheje ishema igihugu cyabatumye.
Yasoje abasaba ko ubumenyi n’ubunararibonye bahakuye babisangiza bagenzi babo bagiye gukomezanya akazi.
Aba bapolisikazi bari bamaze umwaka umwe bari mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro n’umutekano bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye (UN) mu gihugu cya Côte d’Ivoire.
Kugeza ubu abapolisi b’u Rwanda 484 bari mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro hirya no hino ku isi mu bihugu bitandukanye aribyo Haiti, Sudani, Sudani y’Amajyepfo, Liberiya, Gineya Bisawu, Mali, Cote d’Ivoire ndetse no mu Ntara ya Abyei iri hagati ya Sudani na Sudani y’Amajyepfo.

Kuva ku Cyumweru tariki ya 11 Kanama, u Rwanda nta Guverinoma rufite bijyanye n’uko iyari ihari yamaze guseswa.
Ku Cyumweru ni bwo Perezida Paul Kagame yarahiriye kuyobora u Rwanda muri manda nshya y’imyaka itanu, mu birori byabereye muri Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Itegekonshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda riteganya ko “iyo Perezida wa Repubulika amaze kurahira, Minisitiri w’Intebe n’abaminisitiri bagize Guverinoma bahita bavaho”.
Riteganya kandi ko imirimo isanzwe ba Minisitiri bakoraga ihita ijya mu biganza by’abanyamabanga bahoraho muri za Minisiteri.
Itegekonshinga kandi riteganya ko Umukuru w’Igihugu nyuma yo kurahira agomba gushyiraho Minisitiri w’Intebe mu gihe kitarenze iminsi 15, na we afatanyije na Perezida wa Repubulika bagashyiraho abandi ba Minisitiri, abanyamabanga ba leta n’abandi bagize Guverinoma mu gihe kitarenze indi minsi 15.
Perezida Paul Kagame ubwo yari mu karere ka Gakenke mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza, yaciye amarenga yo kugumana Dr Edouard Ngirente nka Minisitiri w’Intebe akanaba umukuru wa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Yagize ati: “Ubwo se we ntimuzamushyigikira tugakomeza tugafatanya, ibibagenewe bigomba kubageraho bikihuta?”
Dr Ngirente Edouard ufite imyaka 51 y’amavuko ni Minisitiri w’intebe w’u Rwanda kuva mu mwaka wa 2017.
Avuka mu karere ka Gakenke. Afite impamyabushobozi y’ikirenga mu bijyanye n’icungamutungo yakuye muri Universite Catholique de Louvain. Yagizwe umukuru wa Guverinoma yari avuye gukora muri Banki y’isi.

Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa kabiri, tariki ya 11 Gashyantare, Ingabo za Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo (FARDC) ku bufatanye n’ingabo za MONUSCO zakomye mu nkokora igitero cy’inyeshyamba za ADF ubwo zagabaga igitero ku baturage ba Mbau, mu majyaruguru y’uburasirazuba bw’umujyi wa Beni. Ni mu birometero 20 ngo ugere mu mujyi wa Beni.
Nkuko bitangazwa n’inzego z’umutekano ngo ahagana mu masa mbiri n’igice z’ijoro (20h30’) z’isaha yaho, inyeshyamba za ADF zagerageje gutera mu isantare ya Mb
... 
rizwa muri Burigade ya 31y’ingabo za Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, ikambitse muri ako gace yahise itabara.
Inzego z’umutekano zakomeje zivuga ko uyu mutwe wari witwaje intwaro ziremereye wahise ukomwa mu nkokora mu mirwano yamaze igihe cy’isaha imwe.
Iyi mirwano ikimara guhosha, haje Burigade ya MONUSCO, mu rwego rwo kungaira ingabo za Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo(FARDC), ubwo yashyiraga ingabo zayo muri aka gace kugira ngo zicunge umutekano waho.
Nta mibare iragaragazwa 
...
ekeye muri iki gitero ariko inzego z’umutekano zikavuga ko izi nyeshyamba zari zigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’abasivili ba Mbau.
Sosiyete sivili muri teritwari ya Beni ikaba yishimiye ubwo butabazi bwa Batayo ya mbere ya Burigade ya 31 y’ingabo za Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kmngo ndetse n’ingabo zishinzwe kugarura amahoro za MONUSCO.
Sosiyetye Sivili ikaba yifuza ko ubufatanye nk’ubu bwakomeza mu kurwanya n’ibindi bitero by’inyeshyamba za ADF bikigaragara muri aka gace.

Igipolisi ca Israyeli catangaje ko carashe umunyepalestina, kur’uyu wa gatandatu, inyuma y’aho asogoteye imbugita abantu batatu mu gisagara ca Yerusalemu.
Ivyo vyakurikiwe n’urwamo rw’amasasu, bivuye ko abapolisi baciye batana mu mitwe n’abanyepalestina baciye batangura gutera amabuye ku bapolisi. Ico gitero kibaye ica kabiri, inyuma y’icakozwe k’umunsi wa gatatu, n’umugore yacumise abapolisi, akoresheje umukasi.
Intureka hagati y’abanyepalestina n’abasirikare ba Israyeli zariyongereye mur’iyi myaka. Kuva mu kwezi kw’icenda, mu bihumbi bibiri na cumi na gatanu, abanyepalestina baramaze kwica abanyisrayeli mirongo ine n'umwe. Mur’ico kiringo nyene, abajejwe umutekano ba Israyeli bakaba bamaze kwica abanyepalestina bashika ku majana abiri na mirongo ine n'umwe.

Nyuma y’imyaka igera kuri 9 birasa naho iminsi ya Abou Diaby mu iyi kipe yo mu majyaruguru ya Londre irimo igera ku musozo kubera ibibazo by’imvune uyu mukinnyi yagiye ahura nabyo.
Mu myaka 9 amaze muri Arsenal, Diaby amaze kugira imvune 42 bituma mu gihe cyose yabaye muri iyi kipe amaze imyaka igera kuri 4 afite ikibazo cy’imvune.
Iminsi 1554 ingana n’ibyumweru 222 ni ukuvuga hafi imyaka 4 yari afite ikibazo cy’imvune. Ibi bikaba bisa naho 
... 
 ikipe ya Auxerre amwambuye amakipe akomeye nka Chelsea ashobora kumureka akagenda.
Abou Vassiriki Diaby yageze mu ikipe ya Arsenal tariki ya 13 Mutarama 2006 ubwo yari afite imyaka 19 y’amavuko gusa. Icyo gihe yagereranwaga n’uwahoze ari kapiteni w’iyi kipe Patrick Viera kubera igihagararo cye n’ubuhanga ku mupira.
Umutoza wa Arsenal, Arsene Wenger avuga ko Diaby yabaye imbata y’umuserebeko yatewe n’umukinnyi wa Sunderland Dan Smith aho ngo ariho yakuye imvune ikomeye yagoranye gukira kugeza na
...
akira.
Abaganga bavuga ko uko agarutse mu kibuga bimufata iminsi 80 yo kongera kuvunika. Ikipe ya Arsenal ikaba yarakinnye imikino 350 kuva Diaby yahagera aho iyo yagaragayemo ari 35%.
Umutoza wa Arsenal yari yatangaje ko mu gihe Diaby yaba yagaragaje ko yakize, ko yiteguye kumwongerera amasezererano. “ Nagaruka, nzamugumana. Nahoze mwizera. Mu mupira w’amaguru, ikintu cy’ingenzi ni ubuzima.” Gusa ibi bikaba bisa naho bizagona dore ko nta cyizere cyo kongera kugaruka mu kibuga.

Emery Bayisenge uheruka gusezererwa mu ikipe ya USM Alger yo muri Algeria, agiye kwerekeza mu ikipe itozwa na Johnattan McKins
Myugariro w’Umunyarwanda Emery Bayisenge wari umaze umwaka adakina, agiye kwerekeza mu gihugu cya Bangladesh mu ikipe itozwa n’uwahoze amutoza mu ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi.
Johnathan McKinstry wahoze atoza Amavubi ni we wafashije Emery Bayisenge kubon ikipe
Iyi kipe agiye kwerekezamo yitwa SAIF Sporting Club ikina mu cyiciro cya mbere, ni ikipe nshya kuko imaze imyaka ibiri gusa ishinzwe, aho yashinzwe mu kwezi kwa 08/2016.
Johnathan McKinstry wamutoje mu Mavubi, ashobora kuba agiye kongera kumutoza
Emery Bayisenge wari umaze iminsi akorera imyitozo mu Rwanda, by’umwihariko aho byavugwaga ko yaba agiye gusubira muri APR FC, yari amaze hafi umwaka atandukanye n’ikipe ya USM Alger, aho umutoza wayo Thierry Froger atigeze amushima.

Nk’uko bigaragaza kuri Twitter y’ishyaka ANC, ejo kuwa Kane nibwo Dlamini-Zuma yarahijwe na Visi- Perezida w’inteko ishinga amategeko, Lechesa Tsenoli, aho yasimbuye Pule Mabe, uheruka kwegura ku mpamvu ze bwite.
Uyu mugore wa mbere wayoboye Komisiyo ya AU, amaze iminsi agarukwaho muri politiki yo muri Afurika y’Epfo ndetse ari mu bahabwa amahirwe yo gusimbura Perezida Jacob Zuma wahoze ari umugabo we mu myaka yashize.
Hari amakuru avuga ko Dlamini-Zuma yagizwe umudepite mu mugambi wo kwinjira m
... 
wiye. Icyo nzi ni uko nje hano kuba umudepite.”
Itegeko Nshinga rya Afurika y’Epfo riteganya ko Perezida wa Repubulika atoranya abajya muri Guverinoma mu basanzwe bagize inteko ishinga amategeko. Bivugwa ko hari umugambi w’uko Dlamini-Zuma azasimbuzwa Minisitiri ushinzwe uburezi bw’amashuri makuru na za Kaminuza, Blade Nzimande.
Abashyigikiye Dlamini Zuma w’imyaka 67 basanga kumugira Minisitiri byamwongerera izina n’amahirwe yo gusimbura umugabo we ku buyobozi bw’ishyaka ANC, bikazatuma yiyamama
...
inda amatora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu ateganyijwe mu 2019. Kuva mu 1994 ishyaka ANC niryo ritsinda amatora.
Mbere yo kujya muri AU, Dr Dlamini-Zuma yigeze kuba muri Guverinoma ku myanya itatu itandukanye. Mu 1994 Perezida Nelson Mandela yamugize Minisitiri w’ubuzima, Thabo Mbeki yamugize Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga mu 1999. Mu 2009 agirwa Minisitiri w’ibikorwa by’imbere mu gihugu.
Dr Dlamini-Zuma, yashakanye na Perezida Zuma, ariko baza gutandukana mu 1998 bafitanye abana bane.
TANGA IGITEKEREZO

Kuri uno wa mungu igenekerezo rya 19 myandagaro niho umuririmvyi Otile Brown yamuka mu gihugu ca Kenya yashika kukibuga c’indege c’itiriwe Merchior Ndadaye ca Bujumbura. Ku makuru dukesha umuririmvyi Sat B,arameza ko ko ariwe yatumyeko uyo mririmvyi mugenziwe kandi akaba yiteze kumwereka ubwiza bw”uburundi kugira azotahe ayaga neza uburundi.
Si ivyo gusa,Sat-B na Otile Brown bariko bategure indirimbo bagiye gusohora vuba kandi kandi izoshimisha abakunzi b’ubumuziki bo mu karere kose ka East Africa. Sat B abandanye amenyesha ko kuva atanguye uno mwuga w’ubuririùvyi icipfuzo ciwe camye co guhindura ishusho y’umuziki hano mu burundi,eka n’abanyamahanga bagakunda umuziki w’iburundi. Ati rero bimwe aratanguye kubishikako kandi azobandanya kugeza ashitse ku ndoto yiwe.
Otile Brown rero,akaba ari umwe mu ba ririmvyibakunzwe murikino gihe haba mu gihugu ciwe ca Kenya canke hano mu karere,akaba yiteguriye gutanga igikorwa ciza kubarundi bimwe vy’umwihariko ariko kandi no kubakunzi biwe bose bo mukarere no mumahanga ka ya kure.

Byabereye ahitwa La Zurriola mu Mujyi wa San Sebastian uherereye mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu. Icyakora nyuma y’uko bimenyekanye ko yarenze ku mabwiriza, yongeye gufatwa ndetse yambikwa n’amapingu kuko yasaga n’uteza amahane. Bagenzi be ngo ni bo bahamagaye abapolisi n’abaganga nyuma yo kumubona yavuye aho avurirwa akigira ku mazi.
Amakuru aravuga ko uyu mugore yari asanzwe akora nk’umurinzi ku mucanga uzwi cyane wa San Conastian mu gace ka La Concha.

Breaking News:AS Kigali inaniwe kwisasira Al-Nasr SC nubwo yabonye amahirwe menshi ikayatera inyoni
Mu mukino wa CAF Confederation Cup wahuzaga AS Kigali ku kibuga mpuzamahanga y’akarere ka Huye umukino urangiye AS Kigali inaniwe kureba mu izamu amakipe yombi agwa miswi.
Uyu mukino watangiye ikipe ya AS Kigali isatira izamu cyane ndetse byagaragaraga ko iyi kipe yari ifite amahirwe yo kubona igitego ariko amahirwe yabonekaga agenda aterwa inyoni.
Mbere y’umukino umutoza Cassa yari yatangaje ko yiteguye neza uyu mukino dore ko yahamyaga ko yatoje neza abakinnyi be bari biteguye uburyo bwo kureba mu izamu.
Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bakomeje gukina neza cyane cyane Kalisa Rashid,Shabalala,Haruna Niyonzima n’abandi batandukanye gusa uburyo bwose baremaga ntabwo bwatanze umusaruro.
Ikipe ya As Kigali yabonye koruneri nyinshi ndetse igerageza n’ubundi buryo bwo gushaka ibitego gusa biranga biba ibyubusa.
Umukino urangiye amakipe yombi aguye miswi ndetse ubu ni ikizamini gikomeye cyane ku mutoza Cassa wa AS Kigali dore ko asabwa kujya gutsindira mu gihugu cya Libya mu mukino wo kwishyura.

Fariouz ariko yitegurira gufata urugendo rumushikana mu gihugu ca Afrika y’epfo mu giteramo c’agakura kigiye kuzoba inyuma y’iminsi mikeyi.
Umuhinyanyzi Kiyoyo Juma asanzwe ategura ibiteramo vyo mu makungu vya Fariouz, atubwira ko muri ico giteramo bitegekanijwe ko Fariouz azoba ari wenyene. Kiyoyo Juma avuga ko hari abandi baririmvyi b’Abarundi basanzwe baba muri Afrika y’epfo basavye ko boronswa akanya ko kuririmba bakifadikanya na Fariouz muri ico giteramo, abo nabo ntibaramenyekana.
Igiteramo kizobera i Cape Town kuva igihe c’isaha zibiri z’ijoro ku masaha yo muri co gisagara, mu nzu y’ibiteramo Maitlant Hall.
Narirya hari Abarundi benshi bari muri ico gihugu, ico giteramo c’umurundi mwenewabo kizobaruhura. Tubibutse ko Fariouz yaramaze igihe ariko aserukira ishirahamwe BRARUDI mw’ihiganwa rya Primusic.
Why in durban ?

Kuri uyu wa gatanu nibwo mu itsinda A haramenyekana ikipe izaherekeza u Rwanda muri 1/2 mu gihe u Rwanda rurakina umukino warwo wanyuma aho ruraba rucakiranye na Senegal yamaze gusezererwa muri aya marushanwa.
U Rwanda rukaba rurakina uyu mukino ntagihunga mu gihe baraba bashaka kurangiza badatakaje inota na rimwe.
Muri iri tsinda undi mukino uraba uhuza ku isaha ya saa cyenda n’igice ikipe ya Burukina Faso na Egypt , umukino uraba ukoemye cyane kuko ikipe itsindwa irahita isezererwa mu gihe ku ikipe ya Burukina Faso isabwa kunyanya gusa.
Umukino ukaba uri bubere kuri Stade Regional i Nyamirambo mu gihe umukino w’u Rwanda na Senegal urabera kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera.

Ni umwanzuro ufashwe nyuma y’iminsi itatu ubutegetsi bwo muri iki gihugu butegetse ko ibikorwa byo kubaka imva ya Etienne Tshisekedi, umuyobozi w’ihuriro ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, UDPS, bihagarikwa.
Minisitiri w’Intebe Wungirije akaba na Minisitiri w’Umutekano w’Imbere mu gihugu, Emmanuel Ramazani Shadary, yatangaje ko iki cyemezo gifashwe mu rwego rwo kwanga kunyuranya n’amabwiriza agenga gushyingura muri Congo.
Yagize ati “Nta handi hatari mu irimbi ashobora gushyingurwa.”
Yakomeje atangaza ko Guverinoma yongeye kwerekana ubushake bwo gutanga ubufasha mu bijyanye n’imihango yo gushyingura Etienne Tshisekedi wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Zaïre.
Radio Okapi dukesha iyi nkuru yanditse ko ubutegetsi nyubahiriza tegeko bw’icyo gihugu na UDPS, ishyaka rya Etienne Tshisekedi, badasenyera umugozi umwe ku bijyanye no kugarura umurambo w’umuyobozi w’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi mu gihugu; watabarutse ku ya 1 Gashyantare 2017, aguye mu Bitaro biherereye i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi.
N’ubwo impande zombi zitavuga rumwe ku hantu azashyingurwa, umuryango wa Etienne Tshisekedi n’ishyaka rye bavuga ko bagaragaje icyifuzo cyo kumushyingura ku cyicaro cy’ishyaka yahoze ayobora, Leta yo ikavuga ko agomba gushyingurwa mu irimbi riherereye muri Komini ya Gombe.
TANGA IGITEKEREZO

Rutahizamu w’ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda Amavubi Sugira Ernest, amaze kwigarurira imitima y’abakunzi ba Al Wahda SC yo mu gihugu cya Syria.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo uyu mukinnyi yerekeje mu gihugu cya Syria gukinira iyi kipe Aho yayisinyiye amasezerano y’imyaka 2, gusa mu minsi amaze amaze kwerekana ko hari byinshi azafasha iyi kipe ikomeye muri iki gihugu.
Al Wahda SC imaze gukina imikino 2 ya gishuti mu gihe barimo kwitegura Shampiyona iratangira vuba gusa iyi mikino Sugira Ernest amaze gutsindira iyi kipe ibitego 3.
Iyi shampiyona iraza gutangira kuri uyu wa gatanu Aho iyi kipe ya Sugira iratangira ihura na Al Wathba.
Nyuma yo kubana bino bintu benshi bakomeje kwibaza niba uyu rutahizamu arakomeza gutya akazaba yanagira icyo afasha Amavubi mu minsi iri imbere.

Abantu bitwaje intwaro bivugwa ko bavuye mu ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo muri DR Congo bateye mu ntara ya Bubanza mu burengerazuba bw’u Burundi barwana n’ingabo z’igihugu abaturage bamwe barahunga nk’uko babivuga.
Urusaku rw’amasasu rwatangiye kumvikana mu gitondo uyu munsi kuwa kabiri taliki ya 22 Ukwakira 2019, abaturage bamwe batangaje ko bahise bahunga imirwano hagati y’ingabo n’aba bateye.
Uruhande rwa leta y’u Burundi ntacyo ruratangaza ku mirwano yabereye mu ntara ya Bubanza.
Fabien Banciryanino 
... 
abasirikare”.
Igice cy’ishyamba ry’Ikibira ku ruhande rw’u Burundi izo nyeshyamba zashakaga kwinjiramo abaturage bavuga ko zifuza kuhashyira ibirindiro zishobora kujya zivamo zitera mu gihugu.
Bwana Banciryanino agira ati: “Abantu bagize ikibazo mu ntara ya Bubanza ni abanyagihugu bo ku mitumba ibiri yo muri Musigati abo muri Dondi no muri Kayange niko ababayo bambwiye.
Abo bari bahunze bajya kuri centre ya Musigati, ariko ubu turimo kuvugana barimo gusubira aho baje bava bakavuga ko batazi neza
...
kanye irwanya leta z’u Burundi, u Rwanda na Uganda.
Mu kwezi gushize kwa Nzeli 2019, umwe mu bategetsi muri Congo yabwiye BBC ko ibi bihugu byose bifite ubushake bwo kurandura iyi mitwe yitwaje intwaro.
Mu mitwe irwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Burundi iri mu Ntara ya Kivu y’epfo, aho aba bashobora kuba baturutse havugwamo; Forces National de Liberation (FNL) Red Tabara, FNl-Nzabampemana, Forces Républicaines du Burundi (FOREBU).
Nta mutwe wo muri iyi uratangaza ko ari wo wagabye iki gitero muri Bubanza.

Umushikiranganji Dukundane yabishikirije, ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa gatatu. Ni inyuma y’urugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Bujumbura kuraba ibibanza bidatunganije neza.
Abanyagihugu bafise amatongo muri komine Mukaza basabwa kwubaka bisunze itegeko rigenga gutunganya ibisagara. Ni akamo baterwa n’umushikiranganji ajwejwe inyubako. Dieudonné Dukundane amenyesha ko mu bibanza bifise uburinganire bwa « are » munsi ya cumi, bategerezwa kwubaka inzu igeretse n’imiburiburi kabiri. Ibifise izirenga cumi nabo bakubaka n’imiburiburi inzu igeretse kane.
Ku bwiwe, ingingo ya 69 y’iryo tegeko ivuga ko mu gihe igihugu kibonye ko igice c’igisagara canke igisagara cotunganywa gushasha, beneho bararonka umuzibukiro. N’igihe nyene itongo atabishatse canke atabishoboye arahabwa amafaranga ajanye n’ivyo bubatse. Hagati aho, avuga ko kitabuza ko abatabishoboye baja hamwe bakubaka ibijanye n’iyo igihugu kiriko kiraja.
Umushikiranganji yabishikirije yisuze itegeko rigenga ibisagara ryo mu mwaka wa 2011 aho rivuga ko uwufise ikibanza gipima ares ziri munsi ya 10 yubaka inzu igeretse ko kabiri mu gihe uwurenza ares 10 yubaka iyigertseko 4.

Mu minsi ishize nibwo umukobwa w'uburanga witwa Chiara Nasti yatangiye kuvugwaho gukundana na Rutahizamu wa PSG Neymar Jr nyuma yo kugenda akora likes(cyangwa akunda amafoto ye), gusa kuri ubu uyu mukobwa yamaze guhishura umusore barimo gukundana.
Umukobwa wavuzweho urukundo na Neymar
Uyu Chiara yashyize iherezo ku bihuha byari bimaze iminsi bivugwa ko ashobora kuba ari mu rukundo na Neymar, nyuma yo kugaragaza ko ameranye neza n'umukunzi we ukina mu kibuga hagati mu ikipe ya Roma, witwa Nicolo Zaniolo.
Uyu munyamideli yashyize hanze amafoto amugaragaza ku munsi w'abakundana yishimye cyane ari kumwe na Nicolo Zaniolo bakundana.
Mu minsi ishize Umunyamakuru w'umutaliyani, Alfonso Signorini, yagize ati 'Nta foto n'imwe ya Nasti itarakunzwe cyangwa ngo ishyirweho ikimenyetso cy'umutima na Neymar, ari gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo ahure nawe, gusa kugeza magingo aya ntibirakunda'.

Nyuma yiminsi mike umunyamideli Zari Hassan atangaje ko atazongera kubyarira Diamond bigatungura benshi, kuri ubu yagaragaye akora ku myanya y’ibanga y’umugabo we ubwo bari mu bwato batembera mu mazi.
Uru rugendo rwakozwe na Diamond ari kumwe n’umufasha we hamwe na Mubyara wa Diamond ndetse n’abarinzi babo.Zari yatunguranye akora ku myanya y’ibanga y’umugabo we ubona aseka cyane,ibintu byatangaje ababonye aya mafoto yakwirakwije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Benshi batunguwe n’uburyo Zari yitwaye imbere ya Mubyara wa Diamond witwa Rommy Jones.Uyu mugore yafashe umwanzuro wo kutongera kubyarira umugabo we nyuma y’igihe kinini Diamond avugwaho ubushurashuzi mu bandi bagore.
Zari ari kumwe n’umugabo we Diamond mu modoka
TUKO yandikirwa muri Tanzaniya yavuze ko Zari na Diamond bashobora gusubukura ibijyanye n’ubukwe hashingiwe ku kuntu ubu babanyemo.Aba bombi kandi bari bamaze iminsi badacana uwaka bishingiye ku makuru yavugwaga ko Diamond akunda umukobwa witwa Tunda nyuma yo kubyarana n’umunyamideri Hamisa Mobetto.
Ubwo yari mu Rwanda mu minsi ishize, Diamond yabwiye itangazamakuru ko nta mugore afite ahubwo ko afite umukunzi ariwe Zari.Yavuze ibi mu gihe uyu mukobwa witwa Tunda nawe atangaza ko yifuza kubyarana na Diamond uko byagenda kose.
Zari Hassan afite abana 5 barimo 3 yabyaranye na Ivan Ssemwanga witabye Imana umwaka ushize wa 2017 akagira kandi babiri yabyaranye n’uyu muhanzi Diamond.
Zari yakorakoye imyanya ya Diamond

Perezida Kagame yageze muri Tanzania mu ruzinduko rw’akazi
Yanditswe na Imvaho Nshya
Perezida Kagame yageze i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania mu ruzinduko rw’akazi rugamije kunoza umubano n’icyo gihugu cy’abaturanyi.
Perezidanse z’impande zombi zemeje ko Perezida Kagame na mugenzi we Dr Pombe Magufuli baza kugirana ibiganiro bigamije guteza imbere imibanire hagati y’u Rwanda na Tanzania.
“Uru ruzinduko ni umwanya wo kuganira ku mubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi ndetse no kwishyira hamwe kw’ibihugu byo mu karere”, nk’uko byemezwa na Perezidansi y’u Rwanda.
Itangazo rya Perezidansi rikomeza rigira riti, “Nyuma y’ibiganiro byabo bazanaganira n’itangazamakuru, umunsi usozwe n’isangira ryateguwe na Perezida Magufuli mu kwakira umushyitsi we, Perezida Kagame.”
Perezida Kagame yaherukaga gusura Tanzania muri Mutarama 2018, akaba kuri iyi nshuro ayisuye avuye muri Afurika y’Epfo aho yari yitabiriye inama y’abayobozi b’ibigo by’ubucuruzi bakiri bato, YPO.
Perezida Magufuli aheruka gusura u Rwanda muri Mata 2018, itangazo rya Perezidansi ya Tanzania rikaba rivuga ko Magufuli ari we watumiye Kagame.
Kuva Magufuli yajya ku butegetsi muri 2015, imibanire y’ibihugu byombi imeze neza ndetse abakuru b’ibihugu bajya bavuga ko hari ibyo umwe yigira ku wundi mu guteza imbere ibihugu bayoboye.
Bitandukanye no ku gihe cya Kikwete wabanjirije Magufuli, uyu we ubuyobozi bwe bukaba bwaragiranye amakimbirane n’u Rwanda ubwo yasabaga u Rwanda kugirana ibiganiro na FDLR, muri 2013.

Umukuru w’umurwi ujejwe gutegura ikibazo co mu mwaka wa gatandatu, avuga ko ibikorwa vyo kwitegura biriko bigenda neza.
Abraham Mbonerane arongoye umurwi wo gutegura ico kibazo giheraheza umwaka wa gatandatu, avuga ko imiduga izokwunguruza ico kibazo yamaze gutegekenywa, ndetse n’igitoro kikaba caramaze gutegekanywa, imbere y’uko kiduzwa igiciro. Mbonerane akavuga ko abigisha, hamwe n’agahembo kabo bazoba bariko barafasha mu kugicungera, bikaba vyose vyaramaze gutegekanywa.
Mwomenya ko ico kibazo rero gitegekanywa gukorwa ku genekerezo rya 27 Rusama umwaka w’2014. Ibice bishika 70 kw’ijana vy’abanyeshure akaba aribo bategekanya gutora ico kibazo, bakazoca baja mw’ishure shingiro. Abanyeshure rero bagera ku 213,292 nibo barindiriwe gukora ca kibazo ca Reta giha uburenganzira abanyeshure bari mu mwaka wa gatandatu, bwo kuja mu mashure yisumbuye.

Emery Unai,umumenyereza w'umurwi wa Arsenal yasezerewe mu mabanga yo kumenyereza uwo murwi kuva kuruyu wa…
Angleterre:Umurwi wa Manchester United,ugiye kugurwa urufovya rw’amadorare y’abanyamerika.
Umurwi w’umupira w’amaguru wa Manchester United wo mugihugu c’ubwongereza mwihiganwa ryo mucicaro ca muri ico gihugu,ugiye kugurwa urufovya rw’amadorare y’abanyamerika.
Umuganwa w’igihugu ca Arabiya Saudite, Mohammed Bin Salman,asanzwe mbere ari umukunzi adasanzwe w’umurwi wa Manchester United,niwe ashaka kugura uwo murwi.
Mohammed Bin Salman akaba yemera kugura uwo murwi wa Manchester United,kumahera y’amadorare y’abanyamerika agera kuri miriyaridi 4,(4 milliards de Dollars Americains) hamwe boba bavyemeye.
Iyi ikaba ibaye incuro igira gatatu uwu muganwa Mohammed Bin Salman wo mugihugu ca Arabiya Saudite agerageje kugura uyumurwi wa Manchester United kubera yaramaze kugerageza izindi ncuro zibiri ariko bikaba bitakunzeko agura uyu murwi.
Mwokwibuka ko umwe mubasanzwe baraguze uwo murwi ndetse afisemwo n’umutahe munini adashaka ko umurwi wa Manchester wojamwo abandi bagwizatunga bamusumvya amahera kubera gutinyako yohava awutakaza burundu.

Ikipe y’ingabo z’igihugu irasubukura imyitozo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 18 Gashyantare, nyuma y’ikiruhuko cy’umunsi umwe umutoza Adil Mohammed yari yahaye abasore be.
Nyuma y’umukino w’umunsi wa 17 wa shampiyona ikipe ya APR FC yakinnye na Musanze FC, umutoza Adil Mohammed yahaye abasore be ikiruhuko cy’umunsi umwe, bakaba bagomba gusubukura imyitozo kuri uyu wa Gatanu .
Usibye gusubukura imyitozo, abakinnyi b’ikipe y’ingabo z’igihugu bagomba kuguma mu mwiherero, bitegura umukino w’umunsi wa 18 wa shampiyona aho APR FC izakira ikipe ya Etincelles kuwa Mbere kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo.

Umutoza Roberto Oliveira Goncalves do Carmo yamaze gushyira umukono ku masezerano y’imyaka 6 atoza Rayon Sports ahabwa inshingano zikomeye zirimo kwegukana ibikombe 2, birimo icya Shampiyona n’icy’Amahoro.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Ukuboza 2018, saa 13:20, nibwo Robertinho n’umuhagarariye Alexis bahuye n’ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports basinya amasezerano y’amezi 6 ndetse azajya ahembwa akayabo k’ibihumbi 4,500 by’amadolari ku kwezi.
Aya masezerano ya Robertinho azasozwa tariki 4 Nyakanga 2019, aje nyuma y’aho ku munsi w’ejo byavugwaga ko uyu mutoza yatandukanye n’iyi kipe kubera umushahara w’umurengera yasabaga yaje kugabanya mu masaha y’umugoroba.
Robertinho yasabye Rayon Sports ko bitarenze iki cyumweru yashakirwa abatoza babiri bamwungirije bo kumufasha, barimo umutoza wungirije n’umutoza w’abanyezamu.

Nk’uko byari biteganijwe, uyu munsi Madamu Victoire Ingabire Umuhoza, Umuyobozi w’ishyaka FDU-Inkingi, yitabye urukiko rw’Ikirenga, rugomba gusuzuma ubujurire bwe n’ubujurire bw’Umushinjacyaha mu rubanza afitanye na Leta y’u Rwanda.

Turkiya iracashimangiye ku gusubizako igihano c'urupfyu
Umukuru w'igihugu ca Turkiya, Recep Teyyip Erdogan, aracahagaze ku ngingo yo kugarukana igihano c'urupfu naho ishirahamwe rya Buraya ritabikozwa.
Aho yavugira kuri television yo mu Bufaransa, yavuze ko ishirahamwe rya Buraya rimaze imyaka 53 ririndirije Turkiya ku mwango, muri ico gihe ngo ibihugu biri inyuma yaho mw'iterambere vyemererwa kwinjira.
Ibi bwana Erdogan abivuze mu gihe abiyamirije igerageza ryo gutembagaza ubutegetsi ryo kw'itariki ya cumi na gatanu z'uku kwezi, bariko baritegurira kuremesha igikorane hagati Istambul.
Abanyamakuru bavuga ko iki gikorane, gihuza abegwa na politike nka bose, kigamije guhosha uruhagarara mu gihe leta ibandanya gufata ibihumbi vy'abakekwa gushigikira abasirikare bagerageje gutembagaza ubutegetsi.

Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa mu buraruko bwa Bujumbura mu Burundi yafashe ingingo yo kugumiza mu munyororo abamenyeshamakuru bane b'ikinyamakuru cigenga Iwacu kuri uyu wa gatatu ku muhingamo.
Abo bamenyeshamakuru ni Agnes Ndirubusa, Christine Kamikazi, Egide Harerimana na Terence Mpozenzi. Iyo sentare yarekuye umushoferi wabo Adolphe Masabarakiza.
Antoine Kaburahe yatanguje ikinyamakuru Iwacu yabwiye ikinyamakuru cigenga SOS Medias ko ari inkuru bakiranye umubababro ariko itabaciye intege.
Aba bamenyeshamakuru b’ikinyamakuru cigenga Iwacu bahagaritswe kuwa 22 ukwezi kw’icumi uyu mwaka. Bafatiwe muri komine Musigati, intara ya Bubanza mu burengero bw’Uburundi aho bafungiwe. Bagirijwe n’icariho c’umushikirizamanza wa Repubulika i Bubanza "gukorana n’abashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’igihugu”.
Batawe muri yompi bariko bakora ku nkuru y'igitero c'umugwi witwaje ibigwanisho wari waje uturuka muri Kongo. Umuhari Red Tabara ugwanya Leta y’Uburundi ufise ibirindiro mu ntara ya Kivu y’ubumanuko muri Repubulika ya demokarasi ya Kongo wahavuye wemera ko abari bateye ari abagwanyi bawo. Igipolisi c’Uburundi cabise abagizi ba nabi gitangaza ko cishemwo 14 gifata n’inkoho.
Inkuru yateguwe n'umumemenyeshamakuru w'Ijwi ry'Amerika Eloge Willy Kaneza

Cap-Vert iheruka gukina imikino ibiri mpuzamahanga ya gicuti mu kwezi gushize, aho yatsinze Andorra ibitego 2-1, igatsindwa na Guinée 2-1.

Umushikiranganji wa Tanzania ajejwe ibibazo vyo mu karere ko m’ubuseruko bwa Afrika, Deodoris Kamala, ariko aragendera Uburundi. Ku musi wa gatatu, igenekerezo rya 17, ukwezi kwa gatatu, yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe kigiye gukura amadorari mirongo ibiri Abarundi bahora batanga kugira ngo baronke uburenganzira bwo kwinjira mu gihugu ca Tanzania. Deodoris Kamala yari aherekejwe n'abagwizatunga bo muri Tanzania ahanini bakorera ku kivuko c'i Dar-Es-Salaam.
Uwo mushikiranganji wa Tanzania yamenyesheje kandi ko reta ya Tanzania igiye guha reta y'Uburundi ikibanza ku kivuko ca Mombasa, nk'uko bikorerwa ibindi bihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe ryo mu karere ko m’ubuseruko bwa Afrika - EAC. Igihugu ca Tanzania ciyemeje kandi kworohereza abagwizatunga b'Abarundi mu gukura inzitizi z’ibituro vyinshi vyo ku mabarabara, zahora zituma bagenda barahagarara.
Hafsa Mossi, umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe imigenderanire mu karere ko m’ubuseruko bwa Afrika, yarashimye izo ngingo za reta ya Tanzania. Reta y'Uburundi yari imaze imyaka ibiri yarakuye amafaranga asabwa Abanyatanzania binjira mu Burundi.
