Mu gihugu c’Ubwongereza, urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru rwari guhuza imigwi ya Manchester United na Bournemouth rwarasibijwe kuwa mungu.
N’ inyuma yaho abategetsi b’Ubwongereza baboneye agatu gatekeye muri stade gateye amakenga bikeka ko yoba ari bombe yatezwe.
Abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi bari bamaze kwinjira muri stade basabwe gusohoka stade y’ahitwa Old Trafford kumvo z’umutekano, mugihe hari hasigaye iminota 20 kugira urukino rutangure.
Abahinga ba gisirikare b’Ubwongereza muvyo gutegura ababombe nibo baciye bayituritsa.
Umwe mu bategetsi ba Bulayi yamenyesheje ko iyo bombe yatezwe mugihe hari hamaze imisi hashikirizwa amajambo y’iterabwoba ku rubuga rwa internet ko hazogabwa ibitero ku bibuga vy’inkino bikoranirwamwo abantu benshi.

Polisi ya Kenya yatangiye iperereza ku muturage wo mu Burundi waguye mu Mujyi wa Nairobi.
Jean de Dieu Kabura ukomoka mu Burundi wari usanzwe atuye mu gace ka Kawangware, umurambo we wasanzwe hafi y’umuhanda witwa Kinyanjui.
Joseph Ondoro umuyobozi wa Polisi mui gace uyu mugabo yari atuyemo, yavuze ko Jean de Dieu Kabura yabonywe n’abantu bagendaga n’amaguru
Joseph Ondoro yagize ati “kugeza ubu ntabwo turamenya uwishe uyu Murundi, gusa iperereza ryatangiye ngo hamenyekane uwamwishe n’icyo yari agamije.”
Uyu muyobozi wa Polisi yabwiye ikinyamakuru the standard ko bitaramenyekana niba uyu murundi yari asanzwe hari ishyaka arimo mu Burundi.
Gusa bamwe mu barwanya Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza bo baravuga ko uyu mugabo wishwe ngo yari asanzwe ari umurwanashyaka mu ishyaka rya MSD rikomeye rirwanya uyu Nkurunziza, bityo ngo nicyo yazize.
Polisi yo iravuga ko ikomeje guperereza ngo imenye niba uyu murundi yari asanzwe ari impunzi.
Imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta muri Kenya iravuga ko hakwiye iperereza ryihuse ngo hamenyekane iby’uru rupfu.
Cidi Otieno uhagarariye imiryango iharanira kurengera itegeko nshinga muri Kenya, aravuga ko hakwiye iperereza, kandi Abarundi bari muri Kenya bagacungirwa umutekano ukomeye.
Kuva muri Mata 2015, Abarundi barenga 400 bamazwe kwicirwa mu Burundi nyuma y’aho Perezida Nkurunziza atangaje ko azongera kwiyamamariza manda ya gatatu, amatora yaje no gutsindamo ariko bigakurirwa n’imvururu, zanatumye abarenga ibihumbi 200 bamaze guhunga igihugu.

Gareth Southgate yoba agiye kumenyereza bwegu Ubwongereza?
Gareth Southgate azobonana n’abategetsi b’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Bwongereza (FA) aho azokora ikibazo co kuba umumenyereza w’umugwi nserukiragihugu.
Southgate amaze gukina inkino zine adatsindwa na rimwe nk’umumenyereza mfatakibanza inyuma yo kunganya ibitego 2-2 na Espagne ku musi wa kabiri.
Azogiriranira ibiganiro yongere avugane n’umukuru wa FA Gregg Clarke, umunyamabanga Martin Glenn, uwujejwe ubuhinga Dan Ashworth hamwe n’abandi bantu babiri bigenga, Howard Wilkinson na Graeme Le Saux.
Bitegekanijwe ko uwo mubonano uzobera muri park ya St George, hanyuma ingingo ya nyuma ikazofatwa na Clarke, Glenn na Ashworth, hanyuma Wilkinson na Le Saux na bo bagire ico bavuze kuri ico gikorwa.
FA yigeze kuvuga ko atamwanya uhari wo kugena uwundi mu menyereza kandi gushika ubu, nta wundi ategekanijwe gukora ikibazo.

Leandre Willy Essomba Onana umunya Cameroon ukinira ikipe ya Rayon Sport amahirwe yo gukinira ikipe y’igihugu yu Rwanda “Amavubi”ageze ahashimishije.
Leandre Onana wageze mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2021 uyu musore ukina asatira mw’ikipe ya Rayon Sport buri mukunzi w’umupira w’amaguru ntashidikanya kubushobozi bwe mu kibuga.
Nyuma yuko Amavubi atangiye gahunfa yo kwakira abakinnyi bifuza gukinira Amavubi abantu batangiye gutekereza no kur’uyu mukinnyi.
Ubwo Umunyamabanga wa FERWAFA Bwana Muhire Henry Brualt yaganiraga na Radio Rwanda yahamijeko ibiganiro bigeze kure n’uyu mukinnyi kuba yazakinira amavubi.

amaica ni ikirwa kiri mu Nyanja ya Caribbean.

Perezida Kagame yageze i Dar es Salaam aho yakiriwe na Minisitiri w’Itegeko Nshinga n’andi Mategeko muri Tanzaniya, Prof. Palamagamba John Kabudi mbere y’ibirori byo kwizihiza Isabukuru y’Imyaka 60 y’Ubwigenge bwa Tanzaniya.
Perezida Kagame yageze kuri Stade Uhuru i Dar es Salaam aho yifatanije na Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan hamwe n’ibihumbi by’Abanyatanzaniya mu birori byo kwizihiza Isabukuru ya 60 y’Ubwigenge.
Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yifatanije na Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan n’abandi banyacyubahiro mu kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 60 igihugu cya Tanzania kimaze kibonye ubwigenge.
Ni rwo ruzinduko rwa mbere, Perezida Kagame agiriye muri Tanzania, kuva Samia Suluhu Hassan yaba Perezida w’icyo gihugu asimbuye John Pombe Magufuli witabye Imana mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka.
Uru ruzinduko rwa Perezida Kagame ruje rukurikira urwo mugenzi we Samia Suluhu Hassan yagiriye mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa munani uyu mwaka.
Perezida Kagame nyuma yitabiriye, binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga, ikiganiro ku guharanira ko Abana bose bagana inzira y’ishuri mu Nama yiswe #WISESummit 2021. Iyi Nama ni gahunda yatangijwe na Qatar Foundation iyobowe na HH Sheikha Moza bint Nasser, nkuko byatangajwe n’imbuga nkoranyambaga Nyakubahwa Perezida w’u Rwanda akoresha.

Rayon Sports yirukanye rutahizamu wabo bari bamaranye imyaka 2 Michael Sarpong nyuma yuko atukiye Perezida wiyo kipe kuri Radio imwe yo mu Rwanda.
Rayon Sports yirukanye Sarpong ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa kane nyuma yuko mu gitondo hari hagaragaye ibaruwa yandikiwe uwo musore bamusaba gutanga ubosobanuro ku magambo yavuze kuri Sadate Perezida wa Rayon ubwo yavugaga ko nta bwenge afite kandi ko adakwiye kuyobora Rayon Sports nk’ikipe y’ubukombe bwiyo kipe.
Ibyo Sarpong yabivuze nyuma yo kutishimira icyemezo kiyo kipe yari yafashe cyo guhagarika amasezerano y’abakinnyi,abatoza,abakozi bose muri rusange kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Rayon Sports nyuma yo kwirukana Sarpong bahise banamwishyuza amafaranga angana n’amadorari 612$ mu manyarwanda angana (575,000) bamugurije ubwo yari agiye gushaka ikipe muri Norvège.
Tubibutseko Sarpongo yaje muri Rayon Sports avuye iwabo muri Ghana mw’ikipe ya Dreams Fc mu mwaka wa 2018 aho mu mwaka we wa mbere yatsinzemo ibitego 16 ndetse afasha iyo kipe kwegukana igikombe cya Shampiyona y’u Rwanda 2018-2019.

Perezida Vladimir Poutine w’Uburusiya yamiriye kure, kur’uyu wa kabiri, ibirego bivuga ko Uburusiya bwagize uruhara mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu mwaka uheze. Porezida Poutine avuga ko ivyo birego ar’ibihuha bikoreshwa muri Amerika, kubera inyungu za politike.
Ivyo Poutine yavyiyamiririje mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru, cabereye m’Uburusiya, ahejeje kubonana na Chanceliere Angela Merkel w’Ubudagi. Abo bategetsi baganiriye ku bijanye n’intambara iri muri Siriya hamwe n’uburyo Uburusiya bubandanya kwigenza kuri Ukraine. Uwo mubonano ntiwari woroshe, bivuye ko ivyo bibazo basanzwe batabihurizako.
Naho biruko, abo bategetsi bompi bavuga ko bashigikiye ibiganiro muri Ukraine. Nayo ku bijanye na Siriya, Merkel avuga ko Uburusiya bufise uruhara rukomeye mu ntambara iri mur’ico gihugu.
Kur’uyu wa kabiri, Perezida Poutine akaba yaciye atera akamo ko gutanga agahengwe k’intambara. Ibiganiro hagati y’imigwi y’abagwanyi na Reta ya Siriya bikaza gusubira gutangura kur’uyu wa gatatu, k’umugwa mukuru wa Astana, I Kazakhstan.
Mur’ico kiganiro kandi Merkel yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko adatinanya Uburusiya, mu gihe bwokwivanga mu matora yo m’Ubudagi, ategekanijwe kuba mur’uyu mwaka. Avuga ko yiteguye kuzohangana n’abo bahiganwa, yisunze ivyo yemera.

Umugabo yatawe muri yombi akurikiranyweho koherereza ubutumwa bwo gusebanya no gutera ubwoba umwe mu bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko amubwira ko azamwica.
Kuwa Kabiri nibwo Umugabo w’imyaka 39 y’amavuko yafatiwe ku Kibuga cy’Indege cya Brisbane ashinjwa gutera ubwoba umwe mu bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Ku munsi wejo hashize yajyanwe mu rukiko rwa Brisbane Magistrate ashinjwa ibyaha bitanu birimo gukoresha telefone utera ubwoba umuntu ko uzamwica.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 39 y’amavuko azingera kuburana ejo mu gihe icyaha cyamuhama ashobora gufungwa imyaka iri hagati y’itanu n’icumi.

Umutoza Didier Gomes yamaze gusezera ikipe ya El Merreikh yo muri Sudan, bimwerekeza mu ikipe ya Simba yo muri Tanzania, nayo idafite umutoza mukuru.
Gomes wahesheje igikombe cya shampiyona ikipe ya Rayon Sports mu 2013, yafashe umwanzuro wo gutandukana na El Merreikh nyuma yo kuyifasha kugera mu mikino y'amatsinda ya Champions League, isezereye Enyimba FC yo muri Nigeria.
Didier Gomes yahesheje igikombe cya shampion Rayon Sports mu 2013 ubwo iyi kipe yabaga i Nyanza
Simba nyuma yo gutandukana n'umutoza wayo mukuru Sven Vandenbroeck, uyu mwanya uracyari ku isoko ariyo mpamvu ibinyamakuru bitandukanye byo muri Tanzania, biri guha amahirwe Didier Gomes umaze gutoza amakipe 8 yo muri Afurika kuba yakomereza urugendo rwe muri Simba.
Gomes kandi yari yarifuje gutoza ikipe ya Mukura Victory Sports ariko umushahara we uhenze umuvana mu batoza bahataniraga uyu mwanya. Gomes kuva yava mu Bufaransa, amaze gutoza amakipe 8 arimo Rayon Sports yatoje 2012-13, Coton Sport 2015-16, Cs Constantine 2016-17, JSM Skikda 2017-18, Ethiopian Coffew 2019, Horoya AC 2019-20, Ismaily 2020, na Al-Merrikh yatandukanye nayo.
TANGA IGITECYEREZO

Umuyobozi wa NATO arasabira Intwaro zitubutse Ukraine mu gihe Zelensky akomeje gushyiraho ubwirinzi bwo mu kirere
Intambara irarimbanyije hagati y’Uburusiya na Ukraine ndetse magingo aya umwe mu bayobozi bakomeye muri NATO yatangaje ko Ukraine ikeneye intwaro zihagije kugirago irusheho guhangana n’Uburrusiya ku bisasu bukomeje gutera mu murwa mukuru Kyiv.
Bwana Jens Stoltenberg umunyambabanga muri NATO yavuze ko Ukraine ikwiye gushyirirwaho ubufasha bukomeye bugamije kuyifasha kwirwanaho ndetse aboneraho kwibutsa ko ubwo Ukraine iheruka guhabwa ubufasha hari icyo byagezeho.
Kugeza ubu igisirikare cya Ukraine cyatangaje kuri uyu wa Kabiri ko cyirimo kurushwa imbaraga mu byagisirikare na Missiles z’Uburusiya.
Perezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yasabye abayobozi bagize umuryango w’ibihugu bikize ku Isi ko akeneye guhabwa ubundi bufasha kugirango arusheho gushyiraho uburyo bugamije gusubiza inyuma ibisasu by’Uburusiya.
Kugeza ubu hari inama y’igitaraganya yabaye nyuma y’aho ibisasu by’Uburusiya bihitaniye abantu barenga 19 mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu.
Ibi bitero bikajije umurego nyuma y’aho Ukraine yigambye ko yaturikije ikiraro kinini cyahuzaga Uburusiya na Cremea ndetse ibi Putin nawe yahise atangaza ko bikwiye kuba ukwihorera ndetse aboneraho no guteguza ibindi bitero bikomeye.
Jens Stoltenberg, uyobora NATO yatangaje ko Ukraine ikwiye guhabwa ubufasha bw’izindi ntwaro kuburyo zagira uruhare mu gukomeza kwirwanaho no gusubiza inyuma ibisasu by’Uburusiya.

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports yabonye amanota atatu yuzuye yakuye kuri Police FC, mu mukino w’umunsi wa 20 wasojwe n’imvururu zo kutishimira ibyemezo by’abasifuzi.
Uyu mukino wabaye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 11 Gashyantare 2024, Saa kumi n’ebyiri z’ijoro kuri Kigali Pelé Stadium.
Abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bari benshi nk’uko bisanzwe bigenda, cyane ko ari na yo ikunzwe na benshi mu Rwanda.
Ikipe ya Police FC yakinnye idafite umukinnyi wa yo w’ingenzi, Bigirimana Abedi wagize imvune mu mukino iyi kipe iheruka 
... 
ifunguye amazamu ku gitego cyatsinzwe na Hértier Nzinga Luvumbu ku mupira yatereye inyuma y’urubuga rwa Police FC, maze Kwizera Janvier wari mu izamu ahindukira asanga umupira mu rushundura.
Nyuma y’iminota itatu gusa, Abashinzwe Umutekano bahise babona igitego cyatsinzwe na Kayitaba Jean Bosco ku mupira wari ugaruwe n’umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports, maze uyu musore awushyira mu rushundura.
Mashami Vincent akibona igitego cyo kwishyura, yahise akora impinduka akuramo Kayitaba Jean Bosco na Mugenzi B
...
ku ikosa bavuga ko ryakorewe na Peter Agblevor ariko Uwikunda avuga ko nta kosa uyu rutahizamu yakorewe.
Umukino warangiye Rayon Sports yegukanye amanota atatu ku ntsinzi y’ibitego 2-1, maze abakinnyi ndetse n’abatoza b’ikipe y’Abashinzwe Umutekano, birunda ku basifuzi bagaragazaga ko bababajwe n’ibyemezo bya bo.
Gikundiro yahise iguma ku mwanya wa kabiri n’amanota 39 ikarushwa atandatu na APR FC ya mbere ifite amanota 45 n’umukino w’ikirarane izakina na Étoile de l’Est.

Ikinyamakuru Financial Times co muri Amerika candika amakuru asesanguye ajanye n’ubutunzi gitangaza ko umugambi wa Covax ujejwe gukwiragiza incanco za Covid-19 mu bihugu bitandukanye, ata kinini uriko urashikako.
Financial Times yemeza ko muri uwo mugambi w’ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y’abantu kw’isi, OMS, ibihugu bitunze bimaze kuharonkera incanco nyinshi gusumba ibikenye. Ico kinyamakuru bimwe mu vyemezo gitanga ni uko mu bihugu bikenye, imiriyoni n’imiriyoni z’abanyagihugu batararonka uruc
... 
bere, abanyagihugu bavyifuza baja baratanguye gucandarwa ku ncuro ya gatatu mu ntumbero yo kwongereza amahirwe yo kutandura Corona.
Ubusumbasumbane The Financial Times ivuga ko bwibonekeza mw’itangwa ry’incanco za Corona bushobora kuzotuma ubwandu bw’uyo mugera bwiyongera, bigenze uko ubutunzi bw’isi bukazosubira inyuma cane nkuko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga.
OMS nayo itangaza ko ibihugu 82 ari vyo bishobora kugera mu mpera z’uno mwaka bitarashikana umugambi w’iryo shirahamwe wo gucandaga ibice 40%
...
 kwa cumi na kabiri. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus atwara OMS asigura ko vyinshi muri ivyo bihugu bibiterwa n’uburyo buke butavyemerera kuronka incanco zikwiye.
Hagati aho, kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins ifise icicaro mu gisagara ca Baltimore kiri muri Reta ya Maryland aha muri Amerika, itangaza ko abamaze kwandura virusi ya Corona kw’isi yose ari imiriyoni 243 n’ibihumbi 300, mu gihe abo imaze guhitana ari imiriyoni 5. Abamaze kwicandagisha kw’isi yose nabo ni imiriyoni 6 n’ibihumbi 700.

Polisi yo mu gihugu cya Kenya ivuga ko yamaze guta muri yombi abasore babiri bacunze Umupolisi ukomeye kujisho maze bamwiba imbunda, Telefone n’ amapingu ubwo yari aparitse imodoka kuri imwe muri Sitasiyo za Polisi zikorera muri iki gihugu.
Umusore umwe witwa Alex Odhiambo hamwe na mugenzi we Amos Owino, batuye mu gace kitwa Kamukunji, mu mujyi wa Nairobi, kuri ubu bari mu maboko ya Polisi, nyuma yaho bibye imbunda kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi.
Amakuru avuga ko iyo mbunda abo basore bayibye Umupolisi wari uparitse imodoka kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi, igifatwa nk’igitangaje, n’uko uwo mupolisi ufite ipeti rya Inspector Of Polisi (IP) witwa Federck Muzungu, ngo yaparitse imodoka agarutse asanga Imbunda yarimo hamwe na Telefoni ebyiri ndetse n’amapingu ntabirimo kandi ntaho bishe urugi rw’imodoka.
Ibyo bikimara kuba, hahise hatangira iperereza, ariko rikorwa uwo mupolisi yamaze gufungwa, nyuma y’amezi abiri ashyize, nibwo kuri uyu wa mbere abana bariho bakina hafi niyo Sitasiyo ya Polisi iri mu ntambwe nka 900, aribwo babonye iyo mbunda.
Polisi yahise ihagera, itangira kubaza abaturage baturiye ibyo bice birihafi ya Situation ya Polisi, maze bavuga ko bigeze kubona abo basore babiri twavuze hejuru, bameze nkabahisha ikintu runaka ariko ngo ntabwo babyitayeho.
Ubwo Polisi yahise itangira gushakisha abo basore bari bavuzwe amazina yabo, birangira batawe muriyombi ubu bikaba biteganyijwe ko bazakorerwa Dosiye bagahita bashyikirizwa ubutabera.

Umukuru w’igihugu c’uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye mu birori vyo guhimbaza umusi mukuru ugira 33 w’ ubumwe bw’abarundi ku murwa mukuru wa politike i Gitega yahamagariye indongozi zose kwirinda gukumirana barwanye ka mwana wa mama maze n,amacakubiri aho yoturuka hose.
Mw’ijambo ryiwe Umukuru w’igihugu yibukije indongozi zitabiriye ibirori gutsimbataza ubumwe kuko ariryo soko ry’intwaro ibereye n’ukwishira n’ukwizana.ahamagarira indongozi kwirinda gukumirana,kamwana wa mama,ishari n’ibindi kuko ubumwe bushobora gupfa iyo habaye indongozi zitabaye abavyeyi ngo zungire ubumwe abo zirongoye. kuva kera rero ngo abarundi bamye bafatanye mu nda ariko ba kavamahanga nibo baje kubasambura mukubiba amacakubiri.
Umukuru w ‘igihugu avuga ko Ubumwe aribwo mushinge wubakiyeko imbona kazoza y ‘uburundi.yibukije ibihe ubumwe bwagiye buratosekara aca anatanga ingingo abarundi bakwiye kuguma bagenderako aho asaba abarundi kwemera ko ubumwe bw’ abarundi bwamyeho,kwiyemeza kuvavanura n’amacakubiri iyo yozanana hose ,gukomeza ubumwe aho umuntu ari hose hamwe no gutunganya ivy ‘igihugu mu bumwe.
Tubibutse ko amasezerano y’ubumwe bw’abarundi yemejwe muri ruhuhuma 1991 n’abarundi bo mu moko yose.

Kate Middleton washyingiranwe n’igikomangoma Prince William banahawe inshingano n’umwamikazi w’ubwongereza Queen Elizabeth zo kuyobora agace ka Cambridge,mu masaha make ashize bamaze kwakira inkuru nziza y’uko uyu muryango wamaze kwibaruka umwana wa gatatu wabo w’umuhungu ahitwa i Lindo Wing mu bitaro bya St Mary’s Hospital. aya makuru akaba yemejwe n’ubwami bwa Kensington Palace.
Kate na Prince William bakiriye mu muryango wabo umwana w’umuhungu ku munsi wa mutagatifu St George,saa 11:01 za mu gitondo, ingoro y’ubwami ya Kensington Palace ikaba yemeje aya makuru ibicishije ku rukuta rwayo rwa Twitter aho yagize iti:
“igikomangoma cyiyoboye agace ka Cambridge cyibarutse neza umwana w’umuhungu saa 11:01 avukana ibiro 8.70kg kuri ubu bose bameze neza”.
umwamikazi w’ubwongereza Queen Elizabeth , igikomangoma cyiyoboyora agace ka Edinburgh, igikomangoma cy’ibirwa bya Wales, igikomangoma cyiyoboyora agace ka Cornwall, ndetse tutibagiwe n’igikomangoma Prince Harry ndetse n’abandi bose bagize umuryango w’ibwami bakiriye ndetse banerekana ko bishimiye iyo nkuru nziza babyutse bumva mu matwi yabo.
Kate Middleton na Prince William byahise bivungwa ko bashobora kubonera izina uyu mwana wabo bibarutse nyuma y’iminsi 2 amaze avutse nkuko byagenze kuri Princess Charlotte ubwo yavukaga mu 2015 amazina ari gukekwa ko ashobora guhabwa iki gikomangoma bibarutse uyumunsi harimo James, Albert ndetse na Arthur.

Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Kabiri, COVID-19 yahitanye abantu 11 barimo abagore 6 n’abagabo 5 mu Rwanda . Abamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo ni 1,038.
Abarwayi bashya babonetse ni 608 bangana na 5.7% by’ibipimo byagashwe.Abasezerewe mu bitaro ni 16.
Uyu munsi hakingiwe abantu 65,259 bagejeje abamaze gukingirwa kuri 1,157,275.
U Rwanda rwabaye igihugu cya kabiri muri Afurika gitangiye ibikorwa byo gukingira abaturage bacyo bose nyuma ya Afurika y’Epfo nayo iherutse kubitangira.

Rutahizamu Hakizimana Muhadjiri uheruka gutandukana na AlKholood FC yo mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri muri Arabie Saoudite, yongeye kwerekeza muri Police FC nk’umukinnyi wayo mushya.
Hakizimana yari amaze amezi atandatu gusa muri Aziya nyuma yo kwerekezayo muri Kamena 2022.
Amakuru dukesha IGIHE, yemeza ko Hakizimana Muhadjiri yamaze gusinyira Police FC ndetse atangazwa nk’umukinnyi wayo mushya kuri uyu wa Gatatu.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 28, yasabye gusinya amasezerano y’amezi atandatu kugira ngo azarebe uburyo yasubira hanze y’u Rwanda mu mpeshyi.
Hakizimana asubiye muri Police FC yari yagiyemo mu 2021 nyuma yo kuva muri AS Kigali, na yo yasubiyemo nyuma yo gutandukana na Emirates Football Club yakiniye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20.
Yerekeje muri Aziya nyuma y’imyaka itatu akinira APR FC yari yaragezemo muri Nyakanga 2016 avuye muri AS Kigali, na yo yari yamuguze muri Mukura Victory Sports.

Taliki ya 01 Ukwakira uyu mwaka Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi, u Bubiligi, u Bufaransa n’u Butaliyani bahuriye I Geneve mu Busuwisi mu rwego rwo kwamagana raporo ya Loni ivuga ku byabereye muri Congo Kinshasa hagati y’1993 na 2003, ikaba ishyira mu majwi u Rwanda.
Hakozwe urugendo rwatangiriye imbere ya Palais Wilson, ahari ibiro bya Madamu Pillay Navanethem, ukuriye akanama kakoze iyo raporo akanaba n’umuyobozi wa komisariya nkuru ya Loni ishinzwe uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu.
Mu magambo yavugwaga n’abari bitabiriye urwo rugendo harimo gushimira ingabo z’u Rwanda kuba zarakoze ibyananiye Loni “guhagarika jenoside y’Abatutsi”, ndetse no kurata ubutwari bw’ingabo z’u Rwanda, ariko bamagana ibyo kubita abicanyi.
Abitabiriye urwo rugendo bamaganye imikorere ya ONU igamije guhungabanya bavuga ko igamije guhungabanya u Rwanda n’akarere, bityo bakaba barasabaga Madamu Pillay kwegura ku mirimo ye ngo kuko Loni itari ONG bakoresha icyo bashaka.
Icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe n’abantu barenga ijana na mirongo itanu b’Abanyarwanda ndetse n’inshuti zabo.

Video | Akaririmbo Umechokoza Nyuki ka Big fariouz mu giteramo i Gitega
Big fariouz yararirimvye n’akaririmbo Umechokoza Nyuki mu giteramo aheruka gukorera i Gitega.
Big fariouz n’umwe mu bagize imisi bariko barateramisha abarundi mu mihingo itandukanye y’Uburundi, uwo mwanditsi w’indirimbo Umechokoza Nyuki yaririmvye haraheze igihe kitari gito, yahavuye agashira mu gitigiri c’uturirimbo yaririmbiye mu ntara ya Gitega aho mu ndwi iheze yari yateramishije abanyagitega, kuri terrain ya basket kuri centre.
Inyuma y’intara ya Gitega, hakaba hamaze kumenyekana ko azoca ateramisha abanya Bujumbura nabo kandi, ariko muri ivyo biteramo, uwo muririmvyi ngo azoca anagurisha urwo rukurikirane rwiwe rushaha #Fizzology, s’ico gusa kuko n’ukwinjira muri ico giteramo, umufuko utifashe neza canke ng’uzobe ur’umutumire ngo ntibizoroha.
Kurikirana uburyo yaririmvye akaririmbo Umechokozaa Nyuki mu giteramo yakoreye mu ntara ya Gitega muri ino ndwi twarangije.

Tariki 4 Nyakanga 2014 u Rwanda rwizihije isabukuru y'imyaka 20 ishize rubohowe rukavanwa mu icuraburindi ubwo Ingabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zahagarikaga Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Ibirori byo kwizihiza uyu munsi byabereye kuri Stade Amahoro byitabirwa n'abakuru b'ibihugu byo mu karere birimo Uganda, Kenya, Sudani y'Epfo na Visi Perezida wa mbere w'u Burundi ndetse n'abandi bahagarariye ibihugu n'imiryango mpuzamahanga bitandukanye. Byaranzwe n'akarasisi k'Ingabo z'u Rwanda (RDF) zari kumwe n'abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda.

Uko imirwi nserukirabihugu izohura mw’ihiganwa rihuza ibihugu vyo ku mugabane wa Buraya EURO 2016 vyamenyekanye. Imirwi 24 ihuriye mu mirwi itandatu itandukanye.
Mu murwi wa mbere A harimwo : Ubufaransa,Rumaniya,Albaniya hamwe n’Ubuswise.
Mu murwi B harimwo : Ubwongereza,Pays deGalles,Uburusiya na Silovakiya.
Mu murwi C harimwo : Ubudagi,Irlande yo mu Buraruko,Polonye na Ukraine.
Mu murwi D harimwo : Espanye,Republika ya Ceke,Tirikiya na Croatia.
Mu murwi E harimwo : Ububirigi,Republika ya Irlande,Ubusuwede n’Ubutariyano
Mu murwi wa nyuma F harimwo : Portugal,Island,Hongrie na Autriche.
Mwomenya ko inkino za ERURO 2016 zizobera mu gihugu c’Ubufaransa.

Leta y’uburundi yamaganye bikomeye bamwe mu Barundi batuye n’abahungiye mu gihugu cya Uganda kubera uburyo bari kwica umuco w’igihugu nkana.
Umujyanama wa perezida w’Uburundi Bwana Alain Diomede NZEYIMANA yateye utwatsi anamagana bamwe mu biganjemo abarundi b’impunzi z’Abarundi mu gihugu cya Uganda bagaragaye bica umuco w’igihugu ubwo bavuzaga ingoma gakondo mu birori by’isabukuru byiswe Nyegenyege ryabereye muri Uganda mu gace ka Jinja.
Ibi abitangaje nyuma y’aho mu bavuzaga ingoma z’umuco wa Kirundi muri ibyo birori hagaragayemo umugore wavuzaga izo ngoma amabere ye yose ari hanze, ndetse akagerageza gukoresha amabere ye nk’umurishyo mu kuvuza ingoma, ibintu abantu benshi biganjemo Abarundi bavuze ko bidakwiye kuko ari ukubangamira umuco w’igihugu.
Uku niko uyu mugore w’Umurundikazi yagaragaye avuza ingoma amabere ye agerageza kuyakoresha nk’umurishyo.
Aya mashusho yavugishike benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Umuvugizi wa perezidansi y’Uburundi yasabye ko umuco w’igihugu cye ugomba kubahwa uko byagenda kose n’aho ariho hose, ndetse asaba ko na UNESCO yabifatira icyemezo kuko umuco w’igihugu ugomba kubahwa.
Twibutse ko bino birori bya Nyegenyege byabaye mu mpera za kino cyumweru turangije

Mu birori bibera mu gihugu cy'u bufaransa bizwi ku izina rya festival de cannes twababwiye ho ubushize, imbwa yitwa uggy imaze guhesha igihembo film yitwa the artist.
iki gihembo cyitwa Palm Dog kikaba cyaratangiye gutangwa mu mwaka wa 2001 gusa. Iyi mbwa imaze gukina film zigera kuri 12 zose, mu mwirondoro wayo, ifite ubumenyi bwo gutabaza polisi iyo hari ikibazo kibaye, gutwara skate board, gukora irushanwa ryo kwiruka n'ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye, impamvu zatumye abagize itsinda rishinzwe gutanga ibihembo bayibenguka ikimero.

Umukinyi akina ku ruhande mu mugwi wa Messager Ngozi Iddy Museremu niwe yatwaye agashimwe k’umukinyi yaranze ukwezi kwa Ruhuhuma umwaka wa 2019 gahora gatangwa n’ikinyamakuru Burundisports cifandikanije n’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Burundi FFB .
Hakaba hatoye abantu bashika kuri 4039 babicishije kuri page Facebook ya Burundisports.com na FFB hamwe na Primus hamwe n’abandi barungitse ubutumwa ku numero ya 61141414.
Ako gashimwe akaba yariko agahiganirwa n’abandi bakinyi nka Ndaye Chancel akina mu mugwi Rukinzo Fc , Kanakimana Bienvenue wa Aigle Noir hamwe nawe nyene Iddy Museremu akinira umugwi Messager Ngozi.
Uku Niko iddy Museremu yabarushije mu majwi y’abarorerezi :
1) Iddy museremu ( Messager Ngizi) 2224 (55%)
2) Kanakimana Bienvenue Aigle Noir 1220 ( 27.8%)
3) Ndaye Chancel Rukinzo Fc 695 (17.2%)
Uku Niko yabarushije mu majwi y’abamenyeshamakuru:
1) Iddy Museremu : 53%
2) Kanakimana Bienvenue : 33,9%
3) Ndaye Chancel 19%9
Mukamenya y’uko ibirori vyo gutanga ako gashimwe kuri Iddy Museremu biza gukorwa n’ishirahamwe Brarudi ribicishije ku kinyobwa ca Primus kuri uyu wa kabiri ku kibuga ca Centre technique kiri mu Ngagara .

Igisasu cyahitanye abanyeshuri 47 muri Nigeria
Igipolisi cyo muri Nigeria kiravuga ko umwiyahuzi wari wiyoberanyije nk'umunyeshuri yiturikirijeho igisasu ku ishuri ryisumbuye riri mu mujyi wa Potiskum igihe abanyeshuri biteguraga kwinjira mu masomo.
Umuvuguzi w'igipolisi yabwiye BBC ko abanyeshuri byibura 47 bishwe naho 79 barakomereka.
Ababibonye biba baravuga ko icyo gisasu cyakurikiwe n'akajagari kuri iryo shuri riri muri leta ya Yobe, ku buryo wasangaga inkweto zinyanyagiye hirya no hino n'amaraso menshi aboneka hasi ku butaka.
Nta muntu cyangwa se umutwe wahise uvuga ko uri inyuma y'icyo gikorwa ariko uyu mujyi wa Potiskum umaze igihe wibasiwe n'ibitero by'umutwe ugendera ku matwara akaze y'idini ya Isilamu wa Boko Haram.

Kuri uno wa gatatu, igenekerezo rya 2 Nyakanga umwaka w’2020, inama Nshikiranganji yakoranye i Gitega ku murwa mukuru wa poritike irongowe n’umukuru w’Igihugu c’Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye, bakaba barabiye hamwe integuro z’amategeko atunganya ibikorwa vy’ubushikiranganji bugize Reta.
Muri iyo nama nshikiranganji bagarutse ku kibazo c’urwaruka rwo mu mashure nshingiro rwananiwe ikibazo ca Reta co mu mwaka w’icenda kibaha uburenganzira bwo kubandanya amashure yisumbuye, aho bamenyesha ko abakiyobewe ata mahirwe yandi basigaranye yo kugisubiramwo.
Umurwi ujejwe gukwiragiza mu bisata abanyeshure bakoze ibibazo vya Reta ukaba wamenyesheje ko abo banyeshure bayobewe bose bategerezwa kuzoca bajanwa mu mashure y’imyuga.

Umunyarwandakazi ufite ubwenegihugu bw’ Ubufaransa akaba yaranabaye Miss w’ Ubufaransa muri iki gihugu Sonia Rolland yageze I Kigali mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 23 Gashyantare 2018
Sonia Rolland ageze ku kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali (Kanombe) yakiriwe n’abantu batandukanye barimo na Miss Rwanda wo mu mwaka ushize wa 2017, Elsa Iradukunda.
Biteganyijwe ko Sonia Rolland azaba ari mubagize akanama nkemurampaka ku munsi wa nyuma wo gutora Miss Rwanda 2018 tariki ya 24 Gashyantare 2018.
Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri Sonia Rolland aje mu Rwanda mu marushanwa ya nyampinga kuko yanaherukaga muri iki gikorwa mu mwaka wa 2009 ubwo hatorwaga Grace Bahati nka Miss Rwanda w’umwaka wa 2009.

YEHOVA yarahumekeye intumwa Petero ngo yerekane isano riri hagati y’ubweranda buvugwa mu gitabu c’Abalewi be n’ukuba twebwe abakirisu dukwiye kuba beranda mu ngeso zacu. (Soma 1 Petero 1:14-16.) “Wa Mweranda” Yehova yiteze ko abarobanuwe be n’abo mu “zindi ntama” bihatira kuba beranda mu ngeso zabo zose, atari muri zimwezimwe gusa.

Muri Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika, Komite y’Abadepite igenzura imikorere y’inzego zishinzwe umutekano w’imbere mu gihugu yemeje ikirego cyo kwirukana ku mirimo ye minisitiri w’umutekano w’imbere mu gihugu, Alejandro Mayorkas.
Abarepubulikani bose uko ari 18 bari muri Komite bemeje ikirego. Naho Abademokarate bose uko ari 15 bagitera utwatsi. Mayorkas ni uwo mu ishyaka ry’Abademokarate rya Perezida Joe Biden.
Abarepubulikani bamushinja ibyaha bibiri: kwica amategeko y’igihugu agenga abinjira n’aba
... 
e umutekano mu majyepfo y’igihugu ku mipaka Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika na Mexique no gukumira abimukira ibihumbi n’ibihumbi badasiba kuhanyura binjira muri Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika kandi nta byangombwa byayo bafite.
Depite Mark Green, wo mu ishyaka ry’Abarepubulikani, ukuriye Komite yavuze ko Minisitiri Mayorkas ari we nyirabayazana kandi ko nta kundi bamugenza. Ni yo mpamvu twagejeje kuri iyi Komite iki kirego kuri Alejandro Mayorkas.”

...
ugenzi wabo Depite Pete Aguilar, ukuriye itsinda ryabo mu nteko ishinga amategeko Umutwe w’Abadepite, yavuze ko iki ari cyo kintu cyonyine gihuza Abarepubulikani ndetse ko nta kindi bashoboye usibye gushakisha za “impeachments” no kunaniza guverinoma.”
Komite ishobora gushyikiriza ikirego inama yose y’Abadepite mu cyumweru gitaha. Ariko kubera umubare muke Abarepubulikani bafitemo, ababisesengura bakaba bibaza niba bazabasha kwemeza ikirego, ku buryo bazakigeza muri Sena kugira ngo ikiburanishe.

Igisata c’ubutunzi mu Burundi kiracari inyuma, ugereranije n’ibindi bihugu biri mukarere k’ibihugu vy’Afrika y’ubuseruko .Uburundi bugeze ku bice bine kw’ijana, mu gihe ibindi bihugu vyo mukarere bigeze kurugero rurenza ibice bitandatu kw’ijana.Ivyo bikaba vyamenyeshejwe na Faustin Ndikumana mu kiganiro yahaye abanditsi n’abanyamakuru.
Igisata c’ubutunzi, kiri inyuma cane ugereranije ni vy’ ibindi bihugu vyaciye mungorane z’intambara nk’Uburundi aha twovuga nk’Urwanda rugeze kuri 15%,Liberiya igeze kuri 33%,Siyera Lewone igeze kuri 13%.
Kubwa Ndikumana umuhinga muvy’ubutunzi,avuga ko kudatera imbere murico gisata bitanga umwizero muke uravye aho bugeze kubice 70% vy’ubukene,ati bizogorana kugira umuntu ashobore kuva mungorane z’ubukene arimwo.
Abandanya avuga ko ingorane z’ubutunzi mu Burundi, zizoguma zihanze abanyabihugu mugihe hatarafatwa ingamba zikomeye mugisata c’irondoka,mugisata c’abikorera utwabo eka no mugihe ba kaboko bataratuzwa mu gihugu.
Itituka ry’agaciro k’ifaranga ry’Uburundi gushika kubice 25% ryatumye bushirwa kurutonde rwa 185 ku bihugu 187 mu mwaka wa 2012 nkuko bibandanya bimenyeshwa n’uyo muhinga.

Iyo myiyerekano yari yitabwe n’imvukira z’intara ya Bujumbura "Rural" hamwe na Syvestre Ndayizeye ajejwe imihari yegukira umugambwe CNDD FDD.
Mu migambwe itavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi banegura ko umwidegemvyo w’ugukora poritike uhabwa bamwe bo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi gusa. Umugambwe MSD ukabona ko ari imyiyamamazo yatangujwe n’umugambwe CNDD FDD kandi hatari bwagere.
Epithace NSHIMIRIMANA, umuvugizi w’umugambwe MSD agira ati : "Umugambwe CNDD-FDD wagumanye ya ntumbero yo gukuraho iyindi migambwe yose kugira muBburundi habeho umugambwe umwe. Imyiyerekano nk’iyo bamaze igihe bakora birerekana neza ko ata poritique bafise yo guteza imbere noguha akazi urwaruka rw’igihugu rugowe, ruri mu bushomeri butagira izina bagaca bahitamwo kuyoborera abantu mwibarabara. Duhanura urwaruka rw’Uburundi kureka kubeshwa, kuko kugira imyiyerekano atariyo nyishu y’ibibazo bihanze Uburundi."
Olivier NKURUNZIZA, umunyamabanga mukuru w’umugambwe UPRONA avuga ko umugambwe UPRONA urangura ibikorwa vyawo vya poritike mu kuri kwamye, ariko agasaba ko mu gihe hoba hari imigambwe itemererwa gukora mu bwigenge, ko yohabwa ubwo burenganzira bw’ukuza irahura n’abanywanyi bayo, kugira nabo bitegurire amatora yo mu mwaka w’2020.
Ni mupfe nk’abagabo ! None muri 2020 ho muzohakur’iki ? Kirimw’abagabo !

Perezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, abandanya gushigikira itegeko ryiwe riziririza impunzi n’abantu bava mu bihugu indwi bigizwe hanini n’Abayislamu kwemererwa ku butaka bwa Amerika.
Muri ico gihe amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka muntu yiyemeje kubandanya kwitwarira iyo ngingo mu masentare.
Abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bagize imyiyerekano mu bisagara bitandukanye mu gihugu mu gihe Abademokarate biteguriye gushiraho itegeko rihagarika ingingo ya Perezida Trump.
Mu butumwa butari buke yanditse ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi, Twitter, Perezida Trump yatangaje kw’umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano mu gihugu, John Kelly, yamubwiye kw’ibintu biriko bigenda neza umuntu aretse ibibazo biri ku rushi. Yatangaje kw’ibibazo bikomeye ku bibuga vy’indege vyatewe n’ingorane z’ivyuma vya ordinateri vyageramiye ishirahamwe ry’indege zitwara abantu Delta Airlines.
Itegeko rya Perezida Trump yateyeho igikumu ku musi wa gatanu, ririmwo guhagarika kwemerera impunzi ku butaka bwa Amerika mu kiringo c’imisi ijana na mirongo ibiri, n’ukuziririza ku butaka bw’igihugu mu kiringo c’imisi mirongo icenda. Iryo tegeko rireba abantu bavuye mu bihugu vya Iraki, Irani, Siriya, Somaliya, Sudani, Libiya na Yemeni.

Ikipe ya Arsenal iri mu biganiro na Real Madrid kugira ngo ibagurishe umukinnyi wayo ukina hagati witwa Francisco Román Alarcón Suárez,Isco umaze iminsi ashyamirana n’umutoza Santiago Solari.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 26 amaze iminsi yicazwa ku ntebe y’abasimbura ya Real Madrid aho bivugwa ko yamaze gusaba ubuyobozi ko bwamurekura akigendera.
Isco yashwanye n’umutoza Solari mbere y’umukino wa UEFA Champions League baheruka gutsinda AS Roma ibitego 2-0,bituma amukura mu bakinnyi 18 bagombaga gukina uyu mukino ndetse kuva ubwo ntarongera kubona umwanya wo kubanza mu kibuga byatumye yifuza kwigendera ndetse Arsenal yagaragaje ko imwifuza.
Biravugwa ko Isco yifuza kuva muri Real Madrid mu kwezi kwa mbere kubera ko atakibona umwanya wo gukina ndetse kuva Solari yahabwa iyi kipe,amaze gukina iminota 78 gusa mu mikino 5.
Arsenal ihanganye n’amakipe akomeye arimo Juventus, AC Milan, Napoli and Man City, kuri uyu musore uzwiho ubuhanga budasanzwe.
Bimaze iminsi bivugwa ko Real Madrid yifuza Aaron Ramsey aho bivugwa ko Arsenal nayo ishobora kuyisaba kubaha Isco utamerewe neza.
Isco washwanye na Solari arifuza kuva muri Real Madrid

Ubuyobozi bg’iyi kipe buvuga ko bufite intego yo kuzamura abakinnyi bakomoka imulenge, kur’ubu bemeza ko batangiye ibiganiro n’ ibigo by’amashuri bikomeye muri Amerika nka Harvard university m’ukubafasha kuzamura abo bana. Ihiganwa Super finale n’ihiganwa ryashizweho n’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaboko basketball (FEBABU) ifadikanije n’ishirahamwe Brarundi babicishije mu kinyobwa Viva.
Iryo higanwa rikaba rihuza imirwi imaze gushika mu gice canyuma c’amahiganwa, haba mu bigeme ndetse no mu bagabo.
Kuri uwu wagatandatu igenekerezo rya 22 Nzero ryari Isango ryari ririndiranywe igishika n’abakunzi ba basketball basidunye n’iyonka mu kuza gushigikira imirwi yabo nka Les Gazelles , Young Sisters, Gymkhana , Dynamo, Urunani na News Stars.
Imirwi ikaba yatsindanye uku gukurikura: Les Gazelles yirahiye Young Sisters 59 kuri 47.
Dynamo ikaba itorohereje Gymkhana mu kuyitsinda amanota 83 kuri 77.
Urunani narwo rukaba rutavyoroheje mu gusubiriza mu ndumane bashirako n’agasunuzo New Stars Ku manota 87 Ku 53.
None mwibaza ko ari nde azotahukana igikombe hagati yiwo mirwi atanumwe uhobahoba?
Mwomenya ko les Gazelles igiye huhamvya Gladiators muri Finale.

Polisi ya Cote d’Ivoire yatabaye abana 68 bakoraga mu mirima ya kakawo (cacoa). Abategetsi bavuze ko abo bana batabawe na Polisi ya Cote d’Ivoire, baturutse mu gihugu gituranyi cya Burukina Faso.
Cote d’ivoire ni igihugu cyo mu burengerazuba bw’Afurika, gikize kw’isi ku gihingwa cya Kakawo (Cacao). Imirima y’iki gihingwa ikorwamo n’abana bakabakaba miliyoni imwe n’ubwo hashyizweho ibikorwa byo guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’abana mu mirimo isaba ingufu.
Ku kigo cyita kuri abo bana giherereye mu majyepf
... 
we, ugira isoni cyane witwa Nounfo, yabwiye Reuters ko ise yamujyanye muri Burukina Faso afite imyaka 13 gukora mu mirima ya Kakawo ya Nyirarume, kandi yamusizeyo.
Yavuze ko yari amaze imyaka ibiri akora, akaza kubonwa na polisi. Polisi yavuze ko isanano yaba iri hagati y’umuryango wa Nounfo n’abashimita abana ritagaragara neza. Niba nyirarume yaba ari umwe mu bantu bagera muri 25 bakekwaho gushimuta abana bamaze gutabwa muri yombi. Bashobora kuzahanishwa igifungo kigera mu myaka 10.
Iki kibazo 
...
rimo gusuzuma amategeko mashya aca ibicuruza bifite aho bihuriye n’ihohotera ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Ku buhoza abana ni igikorwa cyagizwemo uruhare n’abofisiye mu gipolisi barenga 100 kuwa kane no kuwa gatanu w’iki cyumweru gishize, kandi ni icya mbere kuva mu 2014, kibaye i Soubre, mu ndiri ya Kakawo.
Brahima Coulibaly, umwe mu bagize komite y’igihugu ikurikiranira hafi ikoreshwa ry’abana, yavuze ko abategetsi bazakora operasiyo nk’izo mu zindi ntara, mu mezi make ari imbere.

Amasendika y’abigisha muri Zimbabwe yifatanije n’abakozi bo mu gisata c’amagara y’abantu mu gusaba reta kubahemba imishahara mu madolari y’abanyamerika aho guhembwa mw’ifaranga ry’igihugu ryataye agaciro cane.
Benshi mu bakozi ba reta muri Zimbabwe bahembwa amafaranga angana amadolari hafi 55 ku kwezi. Ni ic’icumi c’ayo bahora bahembwa imbere.
Denford Masona, umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe ry’abanganga bakorera mu bitaro vya reta avuga ko batagishobora no gutunga imiryango yabo.
Avuga ko ataco bariko barasaba kitazwi kuri iyi si. Bakeneye gusa kubaho neza. Bamwe muri bo barubatse, bafise abana, bafi ivyo basabwa mu miryango, imishahara itagishobora gufasha. Ni ibi bakeneye.
Abanyezimbabwe benshi ku mbuga hwaniro, bakunze kunegura Perezida Emmerson Mnangagwa. Bavuga ko ataco ariko arakora ngo yiteho abakozi biwe. Bavuga ko arutwa n’igihe c’intwaro za gikoloni.

Mu Burundi hari abagabo batari bake bafata “inkwano” nk’ikiguzi, maze bagafata ko gutanga inkwano bibaha uburenganzira bwo gufata nabi abo bubakanye. Iyo akaba ari ingendo itari nziza, aho abantu bamwebamwe bikika inyuma y’imico n’imigenzo mu gukandamiza abandi.

N’ubwo abagabye igitero cy’i Gatumba mu Burundi cyahitanye impunzi z'Abanyamulenge zisaga 150 bataramenyekana neza, ingaruka za poritiki z’icyo gitero ni bwo zitangiye kwumvikana mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.
Mu mihango yo gushyingura abo Banyamulenge ejo i Bujumbura, Visi-Perezida Azarias Ruberwa, ari na we uyoboye umutwe RCD-Goma wahoze urwanya ubutegetsi bw’i Kinshasa, yatangarije kuri radio ya MONUC, ko umugambi w’amahoro mu gihugu cye waburiyemo.
Bwana Ruberwa yavuze ko, nyuma y’icyo yise itsembabwoko ry’i Gatumba, byari bikenewe kuba bahagaritse inzibacyuho, bagasubira mu masezerano impande zose zasinyanye, bakanibaza aho umugambi w’amahoro ugeze.
Nyuma y’aho hasohotse itangazo rivuga ko abategetsi bakuru ba RCD-Goma bari bagiye gusubira i Goma, akaba ari ho basesengurira neza inzibacyuho yo mu gihugu cyabo.
Nta bwo RCD-Goma ivuga niba irimo kuva muri guverinoma y’inzibacyuho. Ababikurikiranira hafi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo i Kinshasa ariko bo bafite impungenge ko inama z’i Goma zishobora gufata umwanzuro wo kuva mu nzibacyuho.
Umuvugizi wa guverinoma y’i Kinshasa yemera ko ibirimo kuba muri ino minsi biyugarije. Arashinja ariko RCD-Goma kuba ngo irimo gushyira mu bikorwa umugambi yari imaranye igihe wo kuburizamo umugambi w’amahoro. Uwo mutwe ngo urimo kwitwaza iyicwa ry’Abanyamulenge kugira ngo uve muri guverinoma y’inzibacyuho.

Madamu Jeannette Kagame yifatanyije n’abagize Umuryango w’abahoze ari abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, GAERG, ubwo bibukaga imiryango y’Abatutsi yazimye muri Jenoside.
Kuri Twitter yanditse ko kwibuka bariya bantu ari ikintu kiza kuko aribwo buryo bwo kuzirikana ko bambuwe uburenganzira bwo kubaho kandi neza.
Yanditse ati: ” Uyu munsi turibuka imiryango yazimye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi . Bishwe ari abagabo, abagore n’abana bamburwa uburyo bwo kubaho neza.
Imibare ivuga ko Akarere ka Karongi ariko kabaruwemo imiryango myinshi y’Abatutsi yazimye mu gihe Akarere ka Burera ntawahabaruwe.
Abitabiriye kwibuka iriya imiryango bahuriye ku rwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ruri i Nyanza mu Karere ka Kicukiro.

Abayobozi ba Polisi za Sudani na Centre Africa bashimiye imikorere ya Polisi y’u Rwanda
Yanditswe na Umwanditsi Wacu
Ku kicaro gikuru cya Polisi, Umuyobozi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda IGP Dan Munyuza yahakiriye Lt. Gen. Adil Mohamed Ahmed Bashair Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi ya Sudan na Col. Bienvenu Zokoue umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi ya Repuburika ya Centre Africa bashima ibikorwa bya Polisi y’u Rwanda.
Lt. Gen. Adil Mohamed Ahmed Bashair ni na we uyoboye ihuriro ry’abayobozi ba za Polisi zo mu karere k’
... 
nye bugamije gukemura ikibazo cy’umutekano n’ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka cyane cyane byifashisha ikoranabuhanga.
Lt. Gen. Adil Mohamed Ahmed Bashair yashimye umubano uri hagati ya Polisi y’u Rwanda n’iya Sudani ku bikorwa bitandukanye byongera ubumenyi n’ubushobozi cyane cyane amahugurwa abapolisi bakuru baturuka mu bihugu bya Sudan na Repubulika ya Centre Africa bitabiriye amasomo ahanitse agenerwa ba ofisiye bakuru.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi ya Sudani yashimiye Polisi y’u Rwanda uko yashoboy
...
tekano muke muri Rebubulika ya Centre Africa.”
U Rwanda rwatangiye kohereza abapolisi mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga no kugarura amahoro muri Centre Africa mu mwaka wa 2014. Kugeza ubu u Rwanda rufiteyo amatsinda atatu y’abapolisi, rimwe rigizwe n’abapoli 160.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda yashimiye umubano ndetse n’ubufatanye mu bikorwa bitandukanye hagamijwe kurwanya ibyaha ndengamipaka, iterabwoba, icuruzwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge, icuruzwa ry’abantu ndetse n’ibyaha byifashisha ikoranabuhanga.

Nigeria: Gushahura abafata abana ku ngufu byemejwe na Guverineri wa Kaduna
Guverineri wa leta ya Kaduna iri mu majyaruguru ashyira uburengerazuba bwa Nigeria yashyize umukono ku itegeko riteganya ibihano bikomeye ku bagabo bahamwe n'icyaha cyo gufata abagore ku ngufu.
Iri tegeko ryashyizweho umukono na Guverineri Nasir Ahmad el-Rufai, riteganya gukuraho udusabo tw'intanga-ngabo ndetse n'igihano cy'urupfu ku bahamwe no gufata ku ngufu abana b'abakobwa bari munsi y'imyaka 14 y'amavuko.
Mu gihe uwa
... 
mufata ku ngufu acibwa udusabo tw'intanga ndetse agafungwa burundu.
Ab'igitsina gore bakuze bahamwe n'icyaha cyo gufata ku ngufu umwana bazajya bakatwa uduheha dutwara intanga-ngore (fallopian tubes) ndetse bahabwe igihano cy'urupfu.
Mu gihe uwafashwe ku ngufu atagejeje ku myaka 14 y'amavuko, hazajya hacyenerwa na raporo yo kwa muganga kugira ngo ishimangire ibyo birego byo gufatwa ku ngufu.
Abafata abana ku ngufu bazajya banashyirwa mu gitabo cyabugenewe kandi banatangazwe mu bitangazamakuru.
M
...
ir Ahmad el-Rufai yemeje ko koko yashyize umukono kuri iryo tegeko.
Mu cyumweru gishize, abadepite bo muri leta ya Kaduna bari batoye bemeza uwo mushinga w'itegeko.
Ubu Kaduna ni yo leta yonyine mu zigize Nigeria ifite itegeko nk'iryo rihana icyaha cyo gufata ku ngufu.
Mu mezi macye ashize, muri Nigeria hakomeje kubaho ibikorwa bya rubanda n'ubukangurambaga bwo kwamagana gusambanya ku ngufu.
Nubwo hari benshi batawe muri yombi bacyekwaho icyo cyaha, byemezwa ko ikigero cy'abo gihama kikiri hasi.

Ishyirahamwe ryo gusiganwa ku magare muri Kenya ryemeje itsinda ry’abakinnyi batanu bazakina Tour du Rwanda kuva tariki ya 15 – 22 Ugushyingo 2015 bazaza mu Rwanda bavuye mu myitozo muri Singapour.
Charles Mose, Umunyamabanga w’Ishyirahamwe ryo gusiganwa ku magare muri Kenya (KCF) yabwiye The Star ko bahisemo kohereza mu Rwanda ikipe yakuye umwanya wa gatanu mu mikino nyafurika yabereye muri Congo Brazzaville.
Yagize ati “ Kuri uyu wa gatanu barakina isiganwa ry’imyitozo muri Singapour mbere yo kujya mu Rwanda, turashaka ko bazamura urwego rwabo kuko nibo bazakina isiganwa ryo mu Misiri rizaba muri Gashyantare 2015.”
Mu 2013, Kenya yasoje Tour du Rwanda ari iya gatandatu, Njoroge John wari uwa kane ku rutonde rusange apfira mu mpanuka bari gusiganwa muri Phillipines tariki ya 18 Ukwakira 2014 byatumye bataza mu Rwanda mu 2014.
Abanyakenya bazaza mu Rwanda barimo Kangangi Suleiman yari mu ikipe yatwaye umwanya wa gatanu mu gusiganwa nk’itsinda mu mikino nyafurika yabereye muri Congo, ni ku nshuro ya gatatu yitabiriye Tour du Rwanda aho mu 2012 yabaye uwa 12.
Gichora Kamau Joseph yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu 2012 mu isiganwa ryo Kwita Izina yasoje ari uwa 28 na Ariko Paul.
Ekiru Sanwel aheruka kwegukana Tour de Machakos, isiganwa ryabereye muri Kenya ryakinwaga ku nshuro ya kabiri. Yakinnye imyaka ine Tour du Rwanda kuva mu 2009.
Kathurima Ayub yari na Kangangi muri Congo yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu isiganwa ryo Kwita Izina mu 2012 yabonyemo umwanya wa 16.

Ingingo nshasha y'igihugu ca Kenya isaba abanyagihugu kwerekana ivyemezo ko bicandagishije kugira bemererwe mu bibanza bikoraniramwo abantu benshi, yaje giturumbuka ku batari bake.
Reta yafashe iyo ngingo ku musi wa gatatu mu gihe ibitigiri vy’abandura umugera wa Covid-19 bitera vyiyongera cane. Ni abantu bake bubahirije iyo ngingo ku musi wa kane mu gihe bariko bataha iwabo guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noeli. Abakoresha amabisi ku murwa mukuru, Nairobi, ntibasavye ingenzi impapuro zerekana ko bica
... 
udufukamunwa no gusukura iminwe yabo.
Peter Wangari, umudereva wa bisi, avuga ko bataragera aho basaba ko abagira ingendo bakoresheje uburyo bwo gutwara abantu berekana ko bicandagishije. Yamara amenyesha ko kumbure bishobora kuba mu ntango z’umwaka buca utangura.
Ibipimo vyakozwe ku musi wa kane vyerekanye ko abanduye bari ku rugero rwa 32.5 kw’ijana umuntu abigereranije na 0.7 kw’ijana kw’italiki 21 y’ukwezi kw’icumi na rimwe.
Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y’abantu bwari bwatangaje imbere y
...
candagishije vyari gutegerezwa gusabwa kw’italiki 21 y’uku kwezi kw’icumi na kabiri,
kugira bemererwe mu mashule, bagire ingendo bakoresheje uburyo bw’ugutwara abantu, bemererwe mu biro vya reta, mu mahoteri, ubunywero, uburiro na parike z’igihugu.
Yamara sentare yari yanse ko iyo ngingo ishirwa mu ngiro kuko hari hakiri ibintu bidatomoye neza, birimwo kumenya abajejwe gucungera ishirwa mu ngiro ryayo hamwe n’icokorwa ku bantu batazoba bashoboye kuronka incanco ku gihe. ( Reuters)

Gushaka umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu usimbura Carlos Alos Ferrer uheruka kwegura, byakozwe mu ibanga rikomeye cyane ku buryo muri FERWAFA uretse perezida wayo nta wundi ufite amakuru ya nyayo ku mutoza uzaza.
Tariki ya 13 Ugushyingo 2023 nibwo u Rwanda ruzatangira urugendo rwo gushaka itike y’Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2026 aho ruzatangira rwesurana na Zimbambwe kuri Huye Stadium.
Kugeza ubu nubwo hasigaye igihe kitageze ku kwezi, ntabwo umutoza aramenyekana ndetse n’iyo ugerageje kubaza muri FERWAFA bakubwira ko nta makuru bafiteho.
Amakuru avuga ko hari Komisiyo yashyizweho irimo abantu babiri bo muri FERWAFA barimo perezida wa FERWAFA, Munyantwali Alphonse na MINISPORTS, ari bo barimo gushaka umutoza.
Ku wa Kabiri w’icyumweru gishize nibwo habaye inama ya Komite Nyabozi ya FERWAFA yanagombaga guhabwa amakuru aho gushaka umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu bigeze, gusa byarangiye bitabaye kuko perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru, Munyantwali Alphonse ntiyabonetse muri iyi nama kubera izindi nshingano.
Perezida wa FERWAFA, Munyantwali Alphonse na MINISPORTS bivugwa ko ari bo bonyine bafite amakuru y’umutoza ugomba gutoza u Rwanda binavygwa ko yamaze kuboneka, bahisemo kubigira ibanga kugeza umunsi azatangarizwa.
Amakuru ni menshi yatangiye gusohoka avuga ku mutoza ashobora guhabwa ikipe y’igihugu, hari abavuga ko umutoza usanzwe utoza Mukura VS ukomoka muri Spain, Lotfi Afahmia ari mu batekerejweho ni mu gihe bivugwa ko hari umutoza w’Umudage wamaze kugera mu Rwanda aje gutoza Amavubi.

Mu butumwa yanditse ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter kuri uyu wa 18 Werurwe 2021, Umukuru w’Igihugu, Paul Kagame, yavuze ko ababajwe n’urupfu rwa nyakwigendera Perezida Magufuri, yihanganisha abaturage ba Tanzania.
Perezida Kagame yagize ati “Tubabajwe no kubura umuvandimwe wanjye n’inshuti, Perezida Magufuli. Umusanzu we mu gihugu cye no mu karere kacu ntuzibagirana. Nihanganishije cyane umuryango we n’abaturage ba Tanzania. Abaturage b’u Rwanda bifatanyije na Tanzania muri iki gihe kitoroshye.”
Muri 
... 
imenyetso cy’ubucuti mu muco w’Abanyarwanda, nk’uko ibiro by’umukuru w’u Rwanda byabitangaje.
Abakuru b’ibihugu batandukanye bihanganishije abanya-Tanzania
Perezida Félix Tshisekedi wa DR Congo ukuriye kandi umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa Africa, yatangaje kuri Twitter ko yababajwe “n’urupfu rwa mugenzi we kandi umuvandimwe we”, aboneraho kwihanganisha Abatanzaniya.
Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta yatangaje icyunamo cy’iminsi irindwi muri Kenya, anagira ati: “Mbuze inshuti, mugenzi wanjye n’uwo tubona ibintu ki
...
o ku baturage ba Tanzania”.
Perezida w’u Burundi, Evaliste Ndayishimiye, nawe yavuze ko ababajwe rwa Magufuri, avuga ko abarundi bifatanyije n’abanya-Tanzania mu kababaro.
Perezida Yoweli Museveni wa Uganda nawe yavuze ko ababajwe n’urupfu rwa Magufuri yafataga nk’impirimbanyi ya demukarasi, ubukungu n’iterambere ry’Afurika y’iburasirazuba.
Umuryango wa Africa y’iburasirazuba (EAC) nawo watangaje kuri Twitter ko “wifatanyije n’abavandimwe bo muri Tanzania mu cyunamo barimo”.

Facebook ryashinze urubuga rw’abana bari munsi y’imyaka 13
mercredi 6 décembre 2017
Facebook yahora itemerera abana bari musi y’imyaka 13 gukoresha urubuga rwayo.
Abahinga mu bijanye no gutumatumanako amakuru, bavuga ko hari abana banyegeza imyaka y’abo ubu bikavugwa ko abana imiriyoni 20 kw’isi bari musi y’imyaka 13 bakoresha urubuga rwa Facebook.
Bivugwako Facebook yashitse kw’iyo ngingo inyuma yaho urubuga rwa Snapchat ruhaye akaryo abana bari munsi y’imyaka 13 gukoresha urwo rubuga.
Facebook rishikiriza ko abavyeyi aribo barekuriwe guha uruhusha abana babo bari hagati y’imyaka 6 na 12 gukoresha ubwo buryo ngurukana bumenyi ariko bakabwirizwa kuzokwirikirana ivyo abana babo bakora kur’urwo rubuga.
Ikonte z’abana zizokwuguruzwa n’abavyeyi babo kandi nibo barekuriwe kwemeza abagenzi b’abana bazoganira nabo.
Ivyo abana barekuriwe gucisha kur’urwo rubuga hariho gutumatumanako hakoreshejwe kurungika amasanamu hamwe n’amafoto.

Mu ijambo yavugiye mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 30 Ugushyingo 2022, ubwo yakiraga indahiro z’abayobozi bashya baherutse kwinjira muri Guverinoma, Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame yahakanye ko u Rwanda rwateye DR Congo ariko avuga ko “hari impamvu zatujyanayo”.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko atumva ukuntu abantu bifata bagashinja u Rwanda gutera Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, nyamara bakirengagiza ko u Rwanda rufite impamvu zanatuma rujyayo. Yakomoje ku 
... 
bya FDLR byo mu 2019 mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze.
Yavuze ko yasabye mugenzi we wa DR Congo ko u Rwanda rujyayo gufatanya n’ingabo za Congo kurwanya umutwe wa FDLR, ariko ngo igisubizo cyavuyemo nta kindi uretse kubyanga, nyamara bakirengagiza ko umutekano w’u Rwanda ukomeza kubangamirwa.
Ati: “Ubwo barasaga hakurya y’umupaka nabwiye Perezida wa DR Congo ko ubwo ari ubutumire buhagije. Mu gihe mbere nabasabaga ko badutumira tugakorana mu gukemura ikibazo, kurasa ku butaka bwacu ni ubutumire bu
...
uvogera ubusugire bwa DR Congo. Ati: “Nemera ko ubusugire bwa DR Congo bugomba kubahwa, ndabyemera rwose, ariko n’ubw’u Rwanda bugomba kubahwa…Ibyo bitabaye tuzatuma hari umuntu urara amajoro adasinziriye.”
Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ikunze kumvikana ishinja u Rwanda gufasha Umutwe wa M23 ugizwe ahanini n’abanyecongo bavuga ikinyarwanda biganjemo abo mu bwoko bw’abatutsi, ibintu Leta y’u Rwanda itera utwatsi yivuye inyuma, ikavugako ibibazo by’abanyecongo bireba abanyecongo ubwabo.

Imirwi ya Kiyislamu yitwaje ibigwanisho yakoze ibindi bitero vyo kwihora mu gihugu ca Burkina Faso.
Ni ibitero vyo kwihora abanyagihugu batuye mu mihana yanse kwemera kwinjira muri iyo mirwi, canke bikekwa ko bakorana n’abasirikare ba reta, nk’uko vyatangajwe n’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Watch, uyu musi ku wa gatatu.
Igihugu ca Burkina Faso kirongowe n’akagwi k’abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri kudeta, kimaze igihe gihanzwe n’imirwi ya kiyislamu yigumuye, ikorana n’imirwi Al-Qaida na Islamic State.
Iyo mirwi yinjiye muri Burkina Faso, ivuye mu gihugu ca Mali mu myaka 10 iheze.
Umusirikare arongoye igihugu ca Mali, Ibrahim Traore yarateye akamo abasivile kabasaba kugira uruhara mu kugwanya iyo mirwi yigumuye.
Yarinjije kandi mu mirwi ya gisirikare abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bavyisabiye. Vyongeye, mu misi iheze, yarasavye abasivile kwimba ibinogo vyo kugwanirizamwo iyo mirwi.
Iyo mirwi na yo, yaciye yongereza ibitero vyo kwihora no kwica abasirikare, nk’uko bitangwazwa n’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Watch.

Ikipe y’Ingabo z’Igihugu ya Handball yatsinze umukino wayo wa mbere ku bitego 27 kuri 24 ya Tanzania mu marushanwa ya Gisirikare akomeje kubera mu Rwanda.
Uyu mukino waranzwe n’ishyaka ridasanzwe ku mpande zombi cyane ko igice cya mbere cyarangiye u Rwanda ruri imbere cyane, ariko nyuma mu gice cya kabiri kigeze hagati amakipe yose atangira kunganya amanota ariko birangira mu minota ya nyuma u Rwanda rutsinze hafi amanota abiri y’ikinyuranyo umukino uhita urangira.
Bagirishya Anaclet umutoza w’ikipe y’Ingabo z’Igihugu ya Handball nyuma y’umukino yavuze ko uyu mukino bagerageje kuwihutisha cyane ati “twubatse icyizere mu bakinnyi bo hagati birangira dutsinze”.
Avuga ko uyu mukino ubahaye icyizere cyo kongera ingufu kugira ngo imikino itaha nayo bazabashe kuyitsinda.
Akomeza avuga ko ubu icyo bagiye gukora ni ugukomeza kwitegura ndetse n’abakinnyi bakamenyera gutsinda hakiri kare kuko mu minota ya nyuma ikunda kubagora.

Kenya 43-35 Uganda.

Umuhanzi Mazimpaka Arnold uzwi nka Sintex mu muziki amaze iminsi afunzwe hamwe n’undi muhanzi wo mu gihugu cy’abaturanyi i Burundi Navy Amaro bazira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge.
Si aba gusa kuko n’abandi bafunzwe bazira iki cyaha harimo umukinnyi wo mu ikipe ikina mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda ya Gorilla witwa Mukunzi Vivens hamwe n’umugore witwa Valentine Uwambajimana we basanganywe udupfunyika tw’urumogi.
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha Dr. Murangira B. Thierry yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bariya bantu bafashwe hagati y’italiki 3 na 5 Gicurasi 2023.
Umuhanzi Sintex baramupimye mu maraso basanga harimo igipimo cyo hejuru cy’urumogi hamwe na Mukunzi ukinira Gorilla FC.
Sintex naramuka ahamwe n’icyaha azahabwa igihano cy’igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe ariko kitarenze imyaka ibiri cyangwa imirimo y’inyungu rusange.
Abafashwe bose bafungiye kuri Sitasiyo za RIB zirimo iya Kacyiru, Kicukiro na Gikondo mu gihe dosiye zabo zikiri gutunganywa kugira ngo zishyikirizwe ubushinjacyaha.

Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Nzeri 2018, nibwo iyo nkuru y’incamugongo yatangiye gukwirakwira mu bitangazamakuru mpuzamahanga.
Imibare yatangajwe n’ubuyobozi bwa Tanzaniya ivugako abagenzi 86 ari bo bamaze kubarurwa ko bapfuye, mu gihe abandi barenga ijana bagishakishwa mu bikorwa by’ubutabazi bikomeje.
Perezida Kagame yahise atangaza ko u Rwanda rwashenguwe n’iyo nkuru y’byago byibasiye igihugu cy’igituranyi.
Abinyujije kuri Twitter yagize ati "Twihanganishije bikomeye imiryango n’inshuti baburiye mu mpanuka y’ubwato bwabereye mu kiyaga cya Victoria. Twiftanyije namwe muri ibi bihe bikomeye. Turanashimira abagize uruhare mu butabazi."
Iyo mpanuka yabaye ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kane irokokamo abantu 37, ariko ibikorwa by’ubutabazi biracyakomeje kugeza ubu.
Imwe mu mpamvu ikekwa ku kuba yateye impanuka y’ubwo bwato, harimo gutwara abantu benshi barenze ubushobozi bwabwo.
Itangazamakuru ryo muri Tanzania ryatangaje ko bwari butwaye abantu babarirwa hagati ya 400 na 500.
Ikiyaga cya Victoria nicyo kinini mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, kuko ihuza ibihugu nka Tanzania, Uganda na Kenya.
Impanuka yaherukaga kuba ikomeye yabaye muri 2011, aho yaguyemo ababarirwa muri 200.

Umuhanzi Ngabo Medard uzwi nka Meddy,yatawe muri yombi na polisi y’u Rwanda mu gicuku cyo kuri iki cyumweru azira gutwara imodoka yasinze aho kugeza ubu afungiye kuri station ya Remera mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Uyu muhanzi waherukaga gutaramira urubyiruko mu nama ya Youth Connekt 2019,yafashwe mu rukerera na Polisi y’u Rwanda ikorera mu mujyi wa Kigali atwaye imodoka I Remera yasinze ariyo mpamvu kuri ubu agomba kumara iminsi itanu afunzwe hanyuma yafungurwa agatanga ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi 150 Frw.
Amakuru y’uko Meddy yatawe muri yombi, yemejwe n’umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda mu mujyi wa Kigali, ni CIP Umutesi Marie Goretti wavuze ko Meddy yafashwe saa munani z’ijoro ubwo yari atashye mu rugo atwaye imodoka,bamupima bagasanga yanyoye inzoga zirengeje igipimo cyagenwe.
CIP Umutesi Marie Goretti yavuze ko uwo ariwe wese akwiriye kumenya ko polisi y’u Rwanda itazihanganira imyitwarire mibi yo gutwara ikinyabiziga wanyoye inzoga nyinshi ariyo mpamvu yasabye abantu kubireka.
Meddy usanzwe atuye muri Leta Zunze ubumwe z’Amerika,yari amaze iminsi mu Rwanda aho yitabiriye ibitaramo bitandukanye birimo Kwita izina Concert,Youth Connekt,n’ibindi bitandukanye.
